000007.SZ.summary: Shenzhen Quanxinhao Co., Ltd. owns and operates hotels in China. The company operates the Grand hotel located in Shenzhen and the Asia Gulf hotel located in Xiamen. It also provides property management, financial information consulting, venture capital, financial investment, equity investment, and investment management services. The company was founded in 1983 and is based in Shenzhen, China.

000017.SZ.summary: Shenzhen China Bicycle Company (Holdings) Limited engages in the production, assembly, purchase, and sale of bicycles and electric bicycles. It offers bicycles under the EMMELLE brand. The company also engages in the lithium battery material, and jewelry and gold businesses. It offers its products through various e-commerce platforms. Shenzhen China Bicycle Company (Holdings) Limited is based in Shenzhen, China.

000025.SZ.summary: Shenzhen Tellus Holding Co., Ltd., together with its subsidiaries, engages in the sale and maintenance of cars in the People's Republic of China. It engages in the inspection and repair of motor vehicles; manufacture and maintenance of automobiles; sale of accessories; sale of jewelry; manufacture of inspection equipment for motor vehicles; and rental and management of real estate properties. It also provides resource asset management services. The company was formerly known as Shenzhen Tellus Machinery Holding Company Limited and changed its name to Shenzhen Tellus Holding Co., Ltd. in March 1993. The company was founded in 1986 and is based in Shenzhen, the People's Republic of China.

000026.SZ.summary: FIYTA Precision Technology Co., Ltd., together with its subsidiaries, engages in timepiece business primarily in China. It is involved in the designing, production, sale, import, and export of watches, driving units, watchcases, watchbands, and other spare and accessory parts; timepieces; general merchandise, jewelry, stationery articles, handicrafts, toys, diamonds, ornaments, and gifts; timing instruments; and hard materials, such as hard alloy and ceramics. The company also engages in the wholesale, retail, and repair of watches and components; distribution of leather wares, pens, ties, tie clips, electronic products, materials, instruments and meters, office equipment, and communication equipment; advertising business; and brand planning, property management, leasing, commerce, and investment activities. In addition, it offers conference services. The company was formerly known as FIYTA Holdings Ltd. and changed its name to FIYTA Precision Technology Co., Ltd. in December 2019. FIYTA Precision Technology Co., Ltd. was founded in 1987 and is headquartered in Shenzhen, China.

000030.SZ.summary: FAWER Automotive Parts Limited Company manufactures and sells automotive parts and components of environment control systems, chassis systems, steering and transmission systems, safety systems, engine accessory systems, etc. in China. The company offers climate control systems; steering and driving systems; engine accessory systems, such as differential locks, electric fuel pumps, oil pumps, clutch master cylinders, water pumps, and throttle bodies; chassis accessory systems, including engine beam, sub-bracket, rear axis welding, control arm, front frame, and oil pan assembly systems; and suspension and running systems comprising subframe-passenger, leaf spring commercial trucks, rear suspension passenger, passenger strut assemblies, shock absorbers for commercial vehicles, coil springs, torque rods, and control arm assemblies; braking systems; and other products consisting of fasteners, airbags, body control modules, grip brakes, torsion bars, brake camshafts, wiring harnesses, sun visors, gear controls, and automotive instrument clusters. It also exports its products to the United States, France, Italy, South Korea, Japan, and countries in the Middle East. The company was formerly known as Fawer Automotive Parts Company Ltd. and changed its name to FAWER Automotive Parts Limited Company in December 2007. FAWER Automotive Parts Limited Company is based in Changchun, China.

000158.SZ.long_name: Shijiazhuang ChangShan BeiMing Technology Co., Ltd
000158.SZ.summary: Shijiazhuang ChangShan BeiMing Technology Co., Ltd manufactures and sells textile products in China. The company offers yarns, fabrics, clothing products, home textiles, and industrial textiles. It also operates a cloud data center; provides consulting, implementation, operation, and maintenance services for smart cities; and operates an online dispute resolution platform for resolving social contradictions. The company was formerly known as Shijiazhuang Changshan Textile Company Limited and changed its name to Shijiazhuang ChangShan BeiMing Technology Co., Ltd in October 2017. Shijiazhuang ChangShan BeiMing Technology Co., Ltd is based in Shijiazhuang, China.

000301.SZ.summary: Jiangsu Eastern Shenghong Co., Ltd. engages in the research, development, production, and sale of civilian polyester fiber related products. It also engages in the production and supply of thermoelectric power. The company was founded in 1998 and is based in Suzhou, China.

000333.SZ.summary: Midea Group Co., Ltd., together with its subsidiaries, manufactures and sells home appliances, and robotic and automation systems in China and internationally. It operates through four segments: Heating & Ventilation, as well as Air-Conditioner; Consumer Appliances; Robotics and Automation System; and Others. The company offers split, window, portable, and dehumidifier residential air conditioners (ACs); light commercial ACs; and commercial ACs, such as variable refrigerant flow, DC inverter air-cooled chillers and mini chillers, chiller terminals, rooftop, and ATW and commercial heat pump water heaters. It also provides T-type, side by side, three cycle independent, two doors no frost combi, double layered tempered glass, and double crispers refrigerators, as well as wine coolers, and freezers; laundry products comprising washing machines and tumble dryers; kitchen appliance products, such as hoods, hobs, ovens, microwaves, slow cookers, dishwashers, and food waste disposers; and small appliances, including kettles, blenders, juicers, mixers, rice cookers, pressure cookers, induction cookers, contact grills, air fryers, fans and heaters, etc. In addition, the company offers air conditioner, refrigerator, and heat pump heating compressors; household and light commercial air conditioner, and washing machine motors; smart logistics solutions; and manufactures and sells robots. Further, it engages in sale, wholesale, and processing of raw materials of household electrical appliances; and financial business involved in customer deposits, interbank lending and borrowings, consumption credits, buyer's credits, petty loans, factoring, and finance leases. Additionally, the company provides Internet of Things solutions for intelligent appliances. It markets its products under the Midea, Little Swan, MDV, Clivet, GMCC, Welling, MR, TOSHIBA, HICONICS, SUNYE, DORNA, and SERVOTRONIX brand names. Midea Group Co., Ltd. was founded in 1968 and is headquartered in Foshan, China.

000417.SZ.summary: Hefei Department Store Group Co.,Ltd, together with its subsidiaries, operates department stores in China. The company operates 26 department store shopping centers, 191 supermarkets under the Jiafu name, 26 hundred electrical appliances stores, 300 chain stores, one hundred cross-border direct sales centers under the Tesco name, 3 large agricultural product wholesale markets, and 22 standardized vegetable markets. It is also involved in the small loan business, e-commerce and cross-border direct sales, airport entry port operation, and online and offline integration, as well as domestic and foreign trade combined industrial system services. The company was founded in 1959 and is based in Hefei, China.

000419.SZ.summary: Changsha Tongcheng Holdings Co., Ltd. engages in merchandising business in China. The company operates department stores, including shopping malls, electrical appliance chains, specialty stores, and supermarkets. It also provides tourism and hotel, and pawn broking services. The company operates four hotels, including commercial, leisure vacation, and conference hotels. In addition, it is involved in property management and investment activities. The company was founded in 1983 and is based in Changsha, China.

000428.SZ.summary: Huatian Hotel Group Co.,Ltd. operates hotels in China. The company operates hotels that offer mall, food, banquet, spa, and other services. Huatian Hotel Group Co.,Ltd. is based in Changsha, China.

000430.SZ.long_name: Zhang Jia Jie Tourism Group Co., Ltd
000430.SZ.summary: Zhang Jia Jie Tourism Group Co., Ltd. engages in the development of tourism resources, construction of tourism infrastructure, provision of various tourism related services, and development of tourism technologies in China. The company also provides hotel, restaurant, entertainment, and leasing services; and develops real estate properties. It operates primarily in Zhangjiajie and Western Hunan, Hunan province, as well as in other regions. The company, formerly known as Zhang Jia Jie Tourism Development Co., Ltd., was founded in 1992 and is based in Zhangjiajie, China.

000501.SZ.long_name: Wuhan Department Store Group Co., Ltd.
000501.SZ.summary: Wuhan Department Store Group Co., Ltd. engages in the development and operation of retail industry in Hubei province, China. It operates shopping malls and supermarket chains. The company was founded in 1959 and is based in Wuhan, China.

000524.SZ.long_name: Guangzhou Lingnan Group Holdings Company Limited
000524.SZ.summary: Guangzhou Lingnan Group Holdings Company Limited engages in the tourism, hotel, exhibition, and travel businesses in China. It provides outbound tourism, domestic tourism, inbound tourism, etc.; operates international and domestic air ticketing agents, conventions, scenic spot development and management, overseas study consultation, property management, information technology consulting services, computer technology development, technical, and other services; and travel agency. The company also operates hotels. In addition, it engages in the planning, organizing, and reception of various exhibitions and conferences. Additionally, the company offers various imported or domestic cars, commercial vehicles, station wagons, and taxis on long-term and temporary rental basis, as well as for conferences, travel, wedding banquets, and guest transfers; and other car services. The company was formerly known as Guangzhou Dongfang Hotel Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Guangzhou Lingnan Group Holdings Company Limited in May 2015. Guangzhou Lingnan Group Holdings Company Limited is based in Guangzhou, China.

000550.SZ.summary: Jiangling Motors Corporation, Ltd., together with its subsidiaries, develops, assembles, manufactures, and sells automobiles, engines and automobile related parts, and dies and tools in China and internationally. Its products include commercial vehicles, light trucks, heavy trucks, pickup and light buses, SUVs, and MPVs, as well as light EVI trucks and buses, and other products. The company also produces and sells engines, castings, and other components. Jiangling Motors Corporation, Ltd. was founded in 1993 and is headquartered in Nanchang, China.

000559.SZ.summary: Wanxiang Qianchao Co.,Ltd. manufactures and sells auto parts in China and internationally. The company offers roller, needle, seal, wheel bearing units, shock absorber assembly, precision forging, bearing, fuel tank, exhaust muffler system, automotive electronics, universal joint assembly, brake system, constant speed drive shaft, and drive shaft products. The company was founded in 1969 and is based in Hangzhou, China. Wanxiang Qianchao Co.,Ltd. is a subsidiary of Wanxiang Group Corporation.

000564.SZ.summary: Ccoop Group Co., Ltd engages in the retail, supply and marketing, financial, and logistics business in China and internationally. The company operates 14 department stores and shopping malls primarily in Xi'an, Haikou, Tianjin, Baoji, Hanzhong, Yan'an, and Eastern Gansu. It also provides asset management and investment analysis services, as well as investment risks avoidance and asset allocation solutions for high-net-worth customers; Internet banking services; petty loans; pawn-broking services; trade, logistics, and supply chain financing services for manufacturers, agents, and stores; micro financing services to individuals and businesses; and factoring services. In addition, the company operates Cloud Warehouse, which offers supply-chain services integrating storage and dispatching for domestic FMCG manufacturers, brand owners, and dealers; and Cool shop, a supermarket and convenience store that offers daily consumer goods, as well as sells products online. Further, it is involved in the operation of logistics park; member stores, cooperative shops, and franchise stores; and a supply and marketing chain. The company was formerly known as Xi'an Minsheng Group Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Ccoop Group Co., Ltd in February 2017. Ccoop Group Co., Ltd was founded in 1959 and is based in Haikou, China.

000572.SZ.summary: Haima Automobile Co.,Ltd researches and develops, designs, manufactures, and sells automobiles in China. The company's product portfolio includes cars, SUVs, MPVs, new energy and electric vehicles, as well as powertrain products. It also exports its products to Egypt, Chile, the Philippines, Vietnam, and internationally. The company was formerly known as Haima Automobile Group Co.,Ltd. The company was founded in 1988 and is based in Haikou, China.

000581.SZ.summary: Weifu High-Technology Group Co., Ltd. develops, manufactures, and sells diesel fuel injection, exhaust after-treatment, and air management system products primarily in the People's Republic of China. It operates through three segments: Auto Fuel Injection System, Air Management System, and Automotive Post Processing System. The company's fuel injection system products include inline pumps, injectors, distribution pumps, spare parts, and filter products, as well as delivery valves, nozzles, and plungers. Its air management system products comprise gasoline and diesel turbo chargers; and exhaust after-treatment system products consist of catalysts, catalytics, and mufflers. The company also produces and sells engine accessories and purifiers. It offers diesel fuel injection systems that are used in diesel engines for trucks, passenger cars, buses, construction machinery, marine products, and generator sets; exhaust after-treatment system products for the manufacturers of automobile, motorcycle, and general machinery; and air management system products for small-bore diesel engine plants, six-cylinder diesel engine manufacturers, light and heavy commercial vehicles, and passenger cars. The company also exports its products to the Americas, Southeast Asia, and the Middle East. Weifu High-Technology Group Co., Ltd. was founded in 1958 and is headquartered in Wuxi, the People's Republic of China.

000585.SZ.summary: Northeast Electric Development Company Limited researches, designs, develops, produces, and sells products related to power transmission and transformation equipment in the People's Republic of China. The company primarily offers power capacitors and enclosed busbars. It also manufactures and sells electrical equipment; and provides hotel management, catering, and accommodation services. In addition, it offers design, construction, and consultation services for new energy projects. The company was formerly known as Northeast Electricity Transmitting & Transformation Machinery Manufacturing Ltd. Northeast Electric Development Company Limited was founded in 1993 and is headquartered in Haikou, the People's Republic of China.

000587.SZ.summary: Jinzhou Cihang Group Co., Ltd. engages in the processing, production, and sale of gold jewelry products in China and internationally. It also offers financial leasing services; and operates a pawnshop. The company was formerly known as Gold Leaf Jewelry Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Jinzhou Cihang Group Co., Ltd. in March 2016. Jinzhou Cihang Group Co., Ltd. was founded in 1994 and is based in Yichun, China.

000589.SZ.summary: Guizhou Tyre Co.,Ltd. manufactures and sells tires in China. It offers passenger car tires; light truck and urban rail transit tires; tires for engineering, agricultural, and forestry machineries; industrial vehicle tires; and mining tires. It also exports its products to approximately 120 countries and regions, such as the United Kingdom, Italy, South Africa, and South America. The company was founded in 1958 and is based in Guiyang, China.

000599.SZ.summary: Qingdao Doublestar Co.,Ltd manufactures and sells tires in China and internationally. The company is also involved in the research, design, manufacturing, installation, and consultation of casting machinery and equipment, rubber and plastics machinery and equipment, environmental protection machinery, and digital tire molds. In addition, it engages in the real estate business. The company is based in Qingdao, China.

000613.SZ.long_name: Hainan Dadonghai Tourism Centre (Holdings) Co., Ltd.
000613.SZ.summary: Hainan Dadonghai Tourism Centre (Holdings) Co., Ltd. provides hotel accommodation and catering services in the People's Republic of China. The company was founded in 1993 and is based in Sanya, the People's Republic of China.

000622.SZ.long_name: Hengli Industrial Development Group Co., Ltd.
000622.SZ.summary: Hengli Industrial Development Group Co., Ltd. researches and develops, manufactures, and sells automobile air conditioning equipment in China. The company offers car, truck and engineering vehicle, and special vehicle air conditioning equipment; and air conditioning compressors and other products. It is also involved in real estate management and investment management activities. The company is based in Yueyang, China.

000625.SZ.summary: Chongqing Changan Automobile Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, manufactures and sells automobiles, automobile engines, and supporting parts primarily in the People's Republic of China. Its products include passenger, sedan, MPV, SUV, cross-passenger, and EV cars. The company was founded in 1862 and is based in Chongqing, the People's Republic of China.

000659.SZ.summary: Zhuhai Zhongfu Enterprise Co.,Ltd manufactures and sells beverage packaging solutions in China. It offers polyethylene terephthalate (PET) bottles for carbonated soft drinks, drinking water, beer, sauces and jams, edible oils, and wine; PET preforms; PVC/OPP labels; heat shrinkable plastic films; caps; and cartons, as well as OEM services. The company was founded in 1982 and is based in Zhuhai, China.

000678.SZ.summary: Xiangyang Automobile Bearing Co., Ltd. researches, develops, manufactures, and sells automobile bearings in China. The company offers ball, TRB, NRB, CRB, CHB, CVJ, CJ, and other bearings. It also provides various bearing products in the areas of machinery, agricultural machinery, household appliances, wind power, etc. The company serves various heavy-duty, middle-duty, light-duty, and original equipment markets, as well as aftermarket. It also exports its products to Europe, the United States, Southeast Asia, and other countries and regions. The company was founded in 1968 and is based in Xiangyang, China. Xiangyang Automobile Bearing Co., Ltd. is a subsidiary of Tri-Ring Group Co.,Ltd.

000679.SZ.summary: Dalian Friendship (Group) Co., Ltd. operates retail department stores in China. The company also engages in the hotel management activities; and real estate development. Dalian Friendship (Group) Co., Ltd. is based in Dalian, China.

000700.SZ.long_name: Jiangnan Mould & Plastic Technology Co., Ltd.
000700.SZ.summary: Jiangnan Mould & Plastic Technology Co., Ltd. develops, manufactures, and sells auto components. The company offers bumpers, moldings, grilles, license plates, spoilers, body side moldings, wheel opening products, rocker panels, fuel door covers, engine cover strips, and panels. Jiangnan Mould & Plastic Technology Co., Ltd. was founded in 1988 and is based in Jiangyin, China.

000715.SZ.long_name: Zhongxing Shenyang Commercial Building Group Co.,Ltd
000715.SZ.summary: Zhongxing Shenyang Commercial Building Group Co.,Ltd engages in the merchandise retailing business in China. The company offers cosmetics, watches, gold and jewelry, attires, shoes and leathers, telecommunication and housing, textiles, and children goods, etc. through merchandise stores. Zhongxing Shenyang Commercial Building Group Co.,Ltd was founded in 1987 and is based in Shenyang, China.

000721.SZ.summary: Xi'an Catering Co., Ltd. operates and manages restaurants and hotels. The company operates regular chain restaurants, hotels, dumpling restaurants, roast duck restaurants, and others, which provide catering services, food delivery services, and room services. It is also involved in the provision of cooking art training services; and hot spring recuperation and enterprise investment consulting businesses. The company operates 15 branches and 50 regular chain shops in Xi'an, Shaanxi province. Xi'an Catering Co., Ltd. is based in Xi'an, China.

000753.SZ.summary: Fujian Zhangzhou Development Co., Ltd. primarily engages in automobile trading business in China. It is also involved in the water, sewage treatment, and real estate businesses. The company, formerly known as Fujian Shining Group Co., Ltd., is based in Zhangzhou, China.

000757.SZ.summary: Sichuan Haowu Electromechanical Co., Ltd. produces and sells automobile crankshafts in China. It offers passenger car and commercial vehicle crankshafts. The company is based in Chengdu, China.

000785.SZ.long_name: Easyhome New Retail Group Corporation Limited
000785.SZ.summary: Beijing Easyhome Home New Retail Chain Group Co., Ltd. is based in China.

000796.SZ.summary: Caissa Tosun Development Co., Ltd. provides travel and tourism related services in China and internationally. It offers Chinese citizens tourism, foreign citizens inbound tour, business travel, incentive travel, international cooperation and exchange, international conference and exhibition, aviation, railway passenger transportation agency, tourism and information consulting, and online services. The company was formerly known as Hna-Caissa Travel Group Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Caissa Tosun Development Co., Ltd. in December 2019. The company was founded in 1993 and is headquartered in Beijing, China. Caissa Tosun Development Co., Ltd. is a subsidiary of HNA Tourism Group Co., Ltd.

000800.SZ.summary: FAW Jiefang Group Co., Ltd develops, manufactures, and sells passenger cars and accessories. The company was formerly known as Faw Car Co., Ltd. and changed its name to FAW Jiefang Group Co., Ltd in May 2020. The company was founded in 1997 and is based in Changchun, China. FAW Jiefang Group Co., Ltd is a subsidiary of China First Automobile Co., Ltd.

000803.SZ.summary: BECE Legend Group Co., Ltd. produces and sells silk in China. It also develops real estate properties; and provides property management services. In addition, the company engages in automotive trade business; and the provision of post-market services. BECE Legend Group Co., Ltd. has a strategic cooperation agreement with New Concepts Holdings Limited to jointly develop projects through various modes of cooperation, including BOT, EPC, and technology development, as well as manufacture of related equipment. The company was formerly known as Sichuan Jinyu Automobile City (Group) Co., Ltd. and changed its name to BECE Legend Group Co., Ltd. in August 2020. BECE Legend Group Co., Ltd. is based in Nanchong, China.

000813.SZ.summary: Dezhan Healthcare Company Limited researches and develops, manufactures, and sells pharmaceutical products for cardiovascular and cerebrovascular diseases. The company is based in Beijing, China.

000850.SZ.summary: Anhui Huamao Textile Co., Ltd. produces and sells textile products primarily in China. Its products include cotton and polyester yarns, fabrics, and threads. The company offers its products under the Anhui, Chengfeng, and Silver Wave, brands. Anhui Huamao Textile Co., Ltd. is based in Anqing, China.

000868.SZ.summary: Anhui Ankai Automobile Co., Ltd manufactures and sells large, medium, and light buses and automotive parts in China. The company offers various coaches, city buses, school buses, and new energy buses. It exports its products to Hong Kong, Macau, Singapore, Malaysia, the United Arab Emirates, Saudi Arabia, the United Kingdom, Russia, the United States, Australia, Colombia, Ghana, and internationally. The company was founded in 1997 and is based in Hefei, China. Anhui Ankai Automobile Co., Ltd. is a subsidiary of Anhui Jianghuai Automobile Co., Ltd.

000882.SZ.long_name: Beijing Hualian Department Store Co., Ltd
000882.SZ.summary: Beijing Hualian Department Store Co., Ltd engages in the operation and management of shopping malls. It also operates and manages theater, supermarkets, department stores, and international cooperation/brand franchises. It operates approximately 40 shopping malls in China. As of December 31, 2019, the company operated 15 cinemas and 115 screens. It also provides commercial factoring services, such as trade financing, accounts receivable management, and factoring consulting; leasing and property management services; and film projection services. The company was founded in 1998 and is based in Beijing, China.

000887.SZ.long_name: Anhui Zhongding Sealing Parts Co., Ltd.
000887.SZ.summary: Anhui Zhongding Sealing Parts Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells non-tire rubber products in China and internationally. The company offers sealing products, including O-rings, gaskets, and encoders, as well as oil, mechanic, bearing, PTFE, special, and air spring seals; and anti-vibration control technologies, such as engine and top mounts, chassis and torque bushings, exhaust hangers, dampers, stabilized bar bushings, spring pads, bumpers, and radiator isolators. It also provides fluid management solutions comprising power steering, cooling system, fuel system, clean system, and drainage pipes, as well as air intake and exhaust ducts; metal products, including stamping and casting aluminum products, and metal pipes; customized products for transportation, household, and other industries; and air beds. In addition, the company offers charging piles, cooling systems, and gas purifying equipment for new energy vehicles. It serves automotive, construction machinery, petrochemical processing, office automation, railway, and shipping industries primarily under the Dinghu brand name. Anhui Zhongding Sealing Parts Co., Ltd. was founded in 1980 and is based in Ningguo, China.

000888.SZ.summary: Emei Shan Tourism Co.,Ltd operates as a tourism company primarily in Sichuan province, China. It provides travel services, online booking tickets, hotel booking, purchase products, seasonal weather analysis, sight analysis, and others. The company also offers personalized professional services to business travelers. Emei Shan Tourism Co., Ltd is based in Emeishan, China.

000913.SZ.summary: Zhejiang Qianjiang Motorcycle Co., Ltd. engages in the research and development, manufacture, and sale of motorcycles, engines, and components in China and internationally. The company also offers racing cars and scooters. It provides its products under the Qianjiang Motorcycle, Benelli, Keeway, and KSR brands. The company was founded in 1985 and is based in Wenling, China.

000921.SZ.long_name: Hisense Home Appliances Group Co., Ltd.
000921.SZ.summary: Hisense Home Appliances Group Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells white household electrical appliances under the Hisense, Ronshen, Kelon, Hitachi and York brands in the People's Republic of China and internationally. The company's products include refrigerators, residential air-conditioners, central air-conditioners, freezers, washing machines, kitchen appliances, and other electrical appliances. It also offers after-sales services and transportation services. The company was formerly known as Hisense Kelon Electrical Holdings Company Limited and changed its name to Hisense Home Appliances Group Co., Ltd. in October 2018. Hisense Home Appliances Group Co., Ltd. was founded in 1984 and is headquartered in Foshan, the People's Republic of China.

000955.SZ.summary: Xinglong Holding (Group) Company Ltd. produces and sells nonwoven products in the People's Republic of China. The company offers spun laced nonwovens, including sanitary, industrial cleaning, filtering, medical dressing, medical protective, daily cleaning, beauty and skin care, automobile, decorative, apparel interlining, and other materials; and melt blown nonwovens, such as air filtering, respiratory protective, liquid filtering, and oil absorbing materials, as well as wipes. It also provides PET spun bonded nonwovens comprising packaging, filtering, automobile, home decoration and coating compound, building, geotechnical, agricultural and gardening, printing, cable wrapping, and industrial materials; and SMMMXS nonwovens consisting of medical care, personal hygiene, healthcare, and other products. In addition, the company offers nonwoven converted products; agricultural and chemical products, which comprise feed grade dicalcium phosphate, refined humid phosphoric acid, and other refined phosphate products, as well as industrial, agricultural, and feed grade potassium dihydrogen phosphate; and TX spunlace wipes. It also exports its products to Europe, North America, India, Southeast Asia, and internationally. Xinglong Holding (Group) Company Ltd. was founded in 1993 and is based in Haikou, the People's Republic of China.

000957.SZ.summary: Zhongtong Bus Co.,Ltd. manufactures and sells buses in China. It offers coaches, city buses, group buses, electric buses, stock buses, and luxury business buses, as well as public and tourist buses, highway buses, and school buses. The company also exports its products to approximately 90 countries and regions. Zhongtong Bus Co.,Ltd. was formerly known as Zhongtong Bus Holding Co.,ltd. and changed its name to Zhongtong Bus Co.,Ltd. in January 2021. Zhongtong Bus Co.,Ltd. was founded in 1958 and is based in Liaocheng, China.

000978.SZ.summary: Guilin Tourism Corporation Limited provides tourism and related services in China. It is also involved in the cruise passenger, scenic tourism, hotel, road travel passenger transportation, and taxi businesses. Guilin Tourism Corporation Limited is based in Guilin, China.

000980.SZ.summary: Zotye Automobile Co., Ltd engages in the research, development, manufacture, and sale of automobiles in China, Iran, Chile, Russia, and internationally. It offers sedan, SUVs, MPVs, and new energy vehicles. The company also provides parts of new energy cars and engines; transmission products; batteries; motors; and electronic control products. It offers its products primarily under the Zotye, Jiangnan, and Traum brands. The company was formerly known as Anhui Zotye Automobile Co., Ltd and changed its name to Zotye Automobile Co., Ltd in November 2017. The company was founded in 1998 is based in Huangshan, China.

000982.SZ.summary: Ningxia Zhongyin Cashmere Co., Ltd. manufactures, sells, and exports cashmere products in the People's Republic of China and internationally. The company offers woolen cashmere, worsted cashmere, linen, and special yarns; and woven cashmere, woven wool, knitted linen, woven linen, and woven blended fabrics. It also provides various garments, such as cashmere knitted, cashmere/wool knitted, and linen and blended knitwear garments; cashmere/PVA worsted and napping cashmere scarves and shawls; cashmere pilled-in selvedge fulling scarves; and woven blankets. The company offers its products under the Todd & Duncan, Brown Allan, and Philosofie brand names. In addition, it operates clothing stores and e-business Websites. The company was founded in 1998 and is headquartered in Lingwu, the People's Republic of China. Ningxia Zhongyin Cashmere Co., Ltd. is a subsidiary of Lingwu Zhongyin Cashmere Company Ltd.

001696.SZ.summary: Chongqing Zongshen Power Machinery Co.,Ltd. develops, manufactures, and sells motorcycle engines, gasoline and diesel engines, and various agricultural and forestry machinery in China. The company's products include two-wheel, tricycle, ATV, and scooter engines; horizontal and vertical shaft gasoline engines; diesel and automobile engines; mini power tillers and water pumps; and lawn mowers, cleaning machines, and brush cutters. It also provides small size generator sets, lawn machines, high pressure washers, and hedge trimmers. The company exports its products to approximately 100 countries and regions in Europe, the United States, the Middle-East, Southeast Asia, and Africa. Chongqing Zongshen Power Machinery Co.,Ltd. is based in Chongqing, China. Chongqing Zongshen Power Machinery Co.,Ltd., is a subsidiary of Zongshen Industrial Group.

002003.SZ.long_name: Zhejiang Weixing Industrial Development Co., Ltd.
002003.SZ.summary: Zhejiang Weixing Industrial Development Co., Ltd. engages in research and development, production, and sale of clothing accessories in China and internationally. Its products include buttons, zippers, metal parts, and other clothing accessories used in clothing, textile, garment, and other supporting industries. The company is based in Linhai, China. Zhejiang Weixing Industrial Development Co., Ltd. is a subsidiary of Weixing Group Co., Ltd.

002014.SZ.summary: Huangshan Novel Co., Ltd., together with its subsidiaries, manufactures and sells packaging materials primarily in China. The company's packaging materials include plastic color-printing, laminating flexible, vacuum metallized and multi-functional film, medical packaging, breathable and protective membrane, and injection molding materials. Its products are used in foodstuff, daily chemicals, pharmaceutical, agrochemicals, electronics, building materials, and other fields. The company also exports its products to Europe, the United States, Mexico, Japan, the Middle East, and rest of Asia. Huangshan Novel Co., Ltd. was founded in 1992 and is based in Huangshan, China.

002024.SZ.summary: Suning.com Co., Ltd. engages in the retail business in China. Its stores offer various products, including home appliances, 3C products, and mother-and-baby care products, department store products, home installation products, books, smart home, financial products, etc. The company also sells its products online. In addition, the company offers supply chain finance, consumer finance, and payment services. As of December 31, 2018, the company operated 8881 self-operated stores and 2071 franchised stores in Suning.com. The company was formerly known as Suning Commerce Group Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Suning.com Co., Ltd. in February 2018. Suning.com Co., Ltd. was founded in 1990 and is based in Nanjing, China.

002029.SZ.summary: Fujian Septwolves Industry Co., Ltd. provides men's clothing products. It offers T-shirts, jackets, shirts, suits, trousers, and accessories under the Septwolves, Wolf Totem, 16N, and Karl Lagerfeld brands. The company also offers its products through online. In addition, it is involved in the finance, real estate, and investment businesses. The company was formerly known as Fujian Septwolves Garment Industry Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Fujian Septwolves Industry Co., Ltd. in July 2001. The company was founded in 1990 and is based in Jinjiang, China.

002031.SZ.summary: Greatoo Intelligent Equipment Inc. researches, produces, and sells radial tire molds, hydraulic curing presses, precision machine tools, and industrial robots for automobile sector. The company also offers radial segmented and two-piece molds, and giant industrial segmented tire molds. In addition, it provides integrated flexible production line for vehicle milling; automatic electrode flexible production line; and drilling and milling processing automation unit consisting of drilling and milling automatic machining center, robots, material racks, loading and unloading station, and control system. It provides its products in China, the United States, Europe, the Southeast Asia, and South America. The company was formerly known as Greatoo Inc. and changed its name to Greatoo Intelligent Equipment Inc. in October 2015. Greatoo Intelligent Equipment Inc. is based in Jiedong, China.

002032.SZ.summary: Zhejiang Supor Co., Ltd. researches, develops, manufactures, and sells cookware products and household appliances worldwide. The company's cookware products include pressure cookers, woks, frypans, pots, steamers, kettles, cookware sets, knives, spatulas, thermos and flasks, and kitchen gadgets, as well as vacuum food jars and pottery pots; and small kitchen electric appliances comprise electric rice cookers, induction hobs, soymilk makers, electric kettles, food preparation products, electric steamers, slow cookers, baking pans, bread makers, noodle makers, and actifry products. It also offers large kitchen appliances, including sets, range hoods, gas stoves, steam stoves, electric ovens, and sterilizers; and home and personal care appliances, such as vacuum cleaners, garment steamers, steam irons, and air purifiers, as well as sauce pans, steamers, thermal pots, crispers, juice extractors, electric chafing dish products, food processors, gas cookers, water purifiers, and dust cleaners. The company was founded in 1994 and is based in Hangzhou, China.

002033.SZ.summary: LiJiang YuLong Tourism Co., LTD. operates hotels in China. It operates the Intercontinental Hotel, the Hotel Indigo, and Lijiang Lishi Hotel; Impression Lijiang; Lijiang 5596; White Deer Tour; Longde Tourism; Long Yue Restaurant; and Lijiang Longtu Travel Agency located in the city of Lijiang, as well as provides cableway services. The company was founded in 2001 and is based in Lijiang, China.

002035.SZ.summary: Vatti Corporation Limited produces and sells household appliances in the People's Republic of China. The company offers fitted kitchens, gas appliances, kitchen appliances, sanitary products, household electric appliances, stoves, lampblack machines, hobs, water heaters, steaming machines, ovens, disinfection cabinets, kitchen cabinets, cooker hoods, sterilizers, and cupboards. It also engages in the import and export activities. The company was founded in 1992 and is based in Zhongshan, the People's Republic of China.

002042.SZ.summary: Huafu Fashion Co., Ltd. manufactures and supplies yarn products in China. The company offers mÃ©lange yarn, which is used in underwear textiles, casual wear, sportswear, shirts, business suites, socks, and various cloth products, as well as bed linens, towels, decorative fabrics, and other home fabric products. Its mÃ©lange yarns are also used in weft knitting, flat bed knitting, and weaving machines. The company also provides semi-worsted, vortex spun, and rotor spun color yarn products; and grey and dyed yarn products, as well as auxiliary products; and inferior yarn, cotton waste, and waste materials. It also exports its products to Europe, the United States, Japan, the Republic of Korea, and Southeast Asia. The company was formerly known as Huafu Top Dyed Melange Yarn Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Huafu Fashion Co., Ltd. in October 2017. Huafu Fashion Co., Ltd. was founded in 1993 and is based in Shenzhen, China.

002048.SZ.summary: Ningbo Huaxiang Electronic Co., Ltd. designs, develops, produces, and sells passenger car parts in the People's Republic of China and internationally. It offers vehicle interiors and exteriors, metal parts, automotive electronics, trims, and other related products and services. The company was founded in 1988 and is based in Shanghai, the People's Republic of China.

002072.SZ.summary: Kairuide Holding Co., Ltd. produces and distributes textile products. It provides fabric and yarn products, including loom stare, yarn-dyed and cotton fabrics, and others. The company was formerly known as Shandong Demian Incorporated Company and changed its name to Kairuide Holding Co., Ltd. in November 2014. Kairuide Holding Co., Ltd. was founded in 1958 and is based in Dezhou, China.

002076.SZ.summary: Cnlight Co.,Ltd manufactures and sells lighting products in China. It offers LED lighting products comprising LED bulbs, spotlights, ceiling lights, panel lights, tube lights, down lights, strip lights, and candle bulbs, as well as recessed LED ceiling lights; and energy saving lamps consisting of high power, single capped, and double capped fluorescent lamps, as well as electric ballasts and light fixtures. The company also provides ceramic metal halide lamps; home lamps, such as cartoon table, eye protection table, LED desk, office table, floor, and dimmable lamps; automotive lighting products, including HID lamps, ballasts, and kits; and environmental purification products comprising building air purifiers, indoor mini air purifiers, and electronic deodorants, as well as UV lamps and sterilization equipment, and ballasts. Its products are used in various applications, such as solid-state, indoor, outdoor, motor vehicle, and special lighting, as well as for environmental purification applications. Cnlight Co.,Ltd was founded in 1992 and is based in Foshan, China.

002083.SZ.summary: Sunvim Group Co.,Ltd. manufactures and sells home textile products primarily in China. Its home textile products comprise towels, bedding and decorative articles, and furnishing fabrics. The company exports its products to Asia, Europe, the United States, and Australia, as well as to various countries and regions, including the Middle East and South Africa under the Sunvim brand. It also provides real estate services; supplies gas to approximately 300 industrial users, as well as centralized heating for residents and public facilities in Gaomi; and produces, sells, and services water for industrial and human consumption. In addition, the company operates an online shop. Sunvim Group Co.,Ltd. was founded in 1987 and is based in Gaomi, China.

002084.SZ.long_name: Guangzhou Seagull Kitchen and Bath Products Co., Ltd.
002084.SZ.summary: Guangzhou Seagull Kitchen and Bath Products Co., Ltd. researches, develops, produces, and sells kitchen, bathroom, and commercial products in the People's Republic of China and internationally. It offers faucet components, drains, temperature control valves, floor heating systems, bathtubs, shower rooms, and ceramic sanitary wares, as well as woodworks, smart homes, and other customized parts in the bathroom space. The company was founded in 1958 and is based in Guangzhou, China.

002085.SZ.long_name: Zhejiang Wanfeng Auto Wheel Co., Ltd.
002085.SZ.summary: Zhejiang Wanfeng Auto Wheel Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells aluminum alloy wheels for the automotive industry in China. The company also exports its products to Europe, the United States, Asia, and other countries and regions. Zhejiang Wanfeng Auto Wheel Co., Ltd. was founded in 1997 and is based in Xinchang, China.

002087.SZ.summary: Henan Xinye Textile Co., Ltd. produces and sells fabric yarns and apparel fabrics in China. Its products include pure cotton and blended yarns and fabrics, yarn dyed fabrics, and home textiles. The company also exports its products to 12 countries and regions, such as the United States, the European Union, Japan, South Korea, and Hong Kong. Henan Xinye Textile Co., Ltd. is based in Xinyang, China.

002098.SZ.long_name: Fujian SBS Zipper Science&Technology Co., Ltd
002098.SZ.summary: Fujian SBS Zipper Science&Technology Co., Ltd researches, designs, develops, manufactures, and markets zippers under the SBS brand in China and internationally. The company offers nylon, plastic, metal, and coil zippers; snap and prong snap buttons, jeans buttons; and rivets, eyelets, sliders and pullers. It also provides precision molds, and metal and plastic pressing castings. The company also exports its products. Fujian SBS Zipper Science&Technology Co., Ltd was founded in 1984 and is headquartered in Jinjiang, China.

002108.SZ.summary: Cangzhou Mingzhu Plastic Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells pressure and non-pressure pipeline systems, and films in China, the United States, Europe, the Middle East, Southeast Asia, and internationally. It offers gas pipes, water supply pipes, biaxially-oriented polyamide films, pipe fittings, and lithium ion battery separators. The company was founded in 1995 and is based in Cangzhou, China.

002126.SZ.summary: Zhejiang Yinlun Machinery Co.,Ltd. offers oil, water, and gas heat exchange products. It provides oil coolers, including stainless steel, aluminum, and copper-tube oil coolers; and cooling modules comprising charge air coolers, water-air intercoolers, radiator, commercial vehicle cooling, engineering machinery cooling, car front-end, and other cooling module products. The company also offers exhaust gas recirculation systems, urea-SCR systems and aluminum die-casting parts. Its products are used in automobiles, engineering machinery, agricultural machinery, locomotives, wind power generation, generator units, ships, compressors, and industry and civil use applications. The company is based in Tiantai County, China.

002144.SZ.summary: Hongda High-Tech Holding Co.,Ltd. engages in warp-knitting, medical device, trading, and financial investment businesses in China. The company offers automotive interior decorative, lingerie, swimwear elastic, and sports and leisure fabrics. It also provides home textile fabrics for manufacturing curtains, sofas, and beddings. In addition, the company manufactures and retails medical devices for diagnosing the problems of liver, gallbladder, spleen, kidney, pancreas, heart, thyroid, breast, bladder, etc. Further, it exports its automotive interior fabrics to the United States, Germany, Japan, and internationally. The company was formerly known as Zhejiang Hongda Warp Knitting Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Hongda High-Tech Holding Co.,Ltd. in August 2010. Hongda High-Tech Holding Co.,Ltd. was founded in 1985 and is based in Haining, China.

002154.SZ.summary: Baoxiniao Holding Co., Ltd. engages in the manufacture and sale of clothing products in China. Its products include men's suit, jackets, shirts, single pants, coats, suit pants, and vests. The company sells its products through approximately 1,500 sales outlets and online sales network. The company was founded in 2001 and is headquartered in Wenzhou, China.

002159.SZ.long_name: Wuhan Sante Cableway Group Co., Ltd.
002159.SZ.summary: Wuhan Sante Cableway Group Co., Ltd. operates in the tourism industry in China. The company invests in, constructs, and operates approximately 20 sightseeing ropeway and scenic spots projects, including Huashan cableway in Shaanxi; Qiandao Lake cableway in Zhejiang; Fanjing Mountain scenic spot in Guizhou; and Monkey Island scenic spot in Hainan. It also operates a tourism complex. The company was founded in 1989 and is based in Wuhan, China.

002186.SZ.summary: China Quanjude (Group) Co., Ltd. operates Chinese restaurants under the Quanjude and Mingzhu brand name in China. The company produces and sells roast duck and various cooked food products; lotus leaf cakes, sweet noodles, and other roast duck accessories; and mooncakes, dumplings, and Yuanxiao products under the Quanjude and Fangshan brand name. It also offers pasta and the courtesan brand palace cakes; and chili sauce under the Sichuan hotel brand. In addition, the company provides Fortress Garden pasta food products. Further, it offers Chinese food catering services. China Quanjude (Group) Co., Ltd. was founded in 1864 and is based in Beijing, China.

002187.SZ.summary: Guangzhou Grandbuy Co., Ltd. primarily operates department stores in China. It also operates shopping and professional stores; and acts as a wholesale agent, as well as engages in online shopping business. The company is based in Guangzhou, China.

002190.SZ.summary: Sichuan Chengfei Integration Technology Corp.Ltd designs, develops, manufactures, and sells tools and dies in China. It offers dies for outer skin panels, such as the body side, roof, doors, and fenders used in cars; auto panel dies and panels; and stamping dies. The company was founded in 2000 and is based in Chengdu, China. Sichuan Chengfei Integration Technology Corp.Ltd is a subsidiary of Aviation Industry Corporation of China.

002191.SZ.summary: Shenzhen Jinjia Group Co.,Ltd. engages in the research, development, and production of packaging products and packaging materials in China. The company's products include cigarette packets, and products for electronic supplies and daily necessities. It also develops materials, such as laser holographic transfer anti-counterfeiting papers and transfer films. The company was formerly known as Shenzhen Jinjia Color Printing Group Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Shenzhen Jinjia Group Co.,Ltd. in April 2016. Shenzhen Jinjia Group Co.,Ltd. was founded in 1996 and is headquartered in Shenzhen, China.

002193.SZ.long_name: Shandong Ruyi Woolen Garment Group Co., Ltd.
002193.SZ.summary: Shandong Ruyi Woolen Garment Group Co., Ltd. designs, produces, and sells worsted woolen fabrics and garments in China, Germany, and internationally. It offers professional clothing, and uniforms; functional wool fabrics for use in various clothing characteristics, such as anti-UV, anti-static, waterproof, oil-proof, anti-fouling, cool, moisture-permeable, heat-storing, machine washable, flame-retardant, and illuminating protection; and ecological wool fabrics. The company was formerly known as Shandong Jining Ruyi Woolen Textile Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Shandong Ruyi Woolen Garment Group Co., Ltd. in June 2017. Shandong Ruyi Woolen Garment Group Co., Ltd. was founded in 1972 and is headquartered in Jining, China.

002201.SZ.long_name: Jiangsu Jiuding New Material Co., Ltd.
002201.SZ.summary: Jiangsu Jiuding New Material Co.,Ltd. produces and sells glass fiber yarn, fabrics, and FRP products in China. Its fiberglass products include building materials, such as EIFS and wall reinforcement, roofing waterproof, and stone reinforcement products; continuous filament mat; knitted fabrics for chopped strands mats and veil; woven roving for boats body, sports mechanics, military, automotive, etc.; fiberglass joint tapes; fiberglass alkaline-resistant mesh; and roving for wind turbine blades, high-pressure pipes, pressure cylinders, pultrusion, filament winding, and weaving applications. The company also offers e-glass fiber grinding wheel reinforced mesh, e-glass fiber wheel reinforced mesh, e-glass fiberglass yarns and rovings, e-glass fiber cloth, aluminum water filter base fabric, and high silica mesh and fabric for insulation, corrosion resistance, heat resistance, reinforcement, and other use. In addition, it provides pultrusion profile, a composite material for cooling tower, infrastructure, electricity insulation, chemical industry, and industrial and consumer goods applications; grille, a structural plate; and chemical environment protection equipment. The company also exports its products to approximately 50 countries, including North America, Europe, Southeast Asia, Japan, and South Korea. The company was formerly known as Jiangsu Jiuding Group. Jiangsu Jiuding New Material Co.,Ltd. was founded in 1994 and is based in Rugao, China.

002213.SZ.long_name: Shenzhen Dawei Innovation Technology Co., Ltd.
002213.SZ.summary: Shenzhen Dawei Innovation Technology Co., Ltd. develops, produces, and sells auxiliary brake products in China. The company primarily offers hydraulic and current retarders, and controllers. It also exports its products to Italy, Australia, South Korea, Thailand, the Philippines, Vietnam, Ghana, Panama, Cuba, Turkey, Tunisia, Chile, the United Arab Emirates, and Oman. The company was formerly known as Shenzhen Terca Technology Co., Ltd and changed its name to Shenzhen Dawei Innovation Technology Co., Ltd. in August 2020. Shenzhen Dawei Innovation Technology Co., Ltd. was founded in 2000 and is based in Shenzhen, China.

002228.SZ.long_name: Xiamen Hexing Packaging Printing Co., Ltd.
002228.SZ.summary: Xiamen Hexing Packaging Printing Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells packaging materials in China. It offers corrugated cartons that are primarily used as packaging products for protecting products, facilitating transportation, and handling and improving publicity; pre-printed corrugated paperboards; color printing used in middle-to-high-end commodity packaging; pearl foams; honeycomb paperboards; and molded pulp. The company also provides designing and manufacturing services for various kinds of books, periodicals, instructions, and other products. It serves customers in household appliance, electronics, food products, beverages, cosmetics, daily-use chemical products, pharmaceuticals, automobile parts, kitchen and sanitary wares, and other areas. The company was founded in 1993 and is based in Xiamen, China.

002239.SZ.long_name: Aotecar New Energy Technology Co., Ltd.
002239.SZ.summary: Aotecar New Energy Technology Co., Ltd. engages in the research and development, production, and sale of automotive a/c compressors. It offers scroll compressors, electric compressors, fixed displacement piston compressors, and variable displacement piston compressors. The company was formerly known as Jiangsu Kingfield Garments Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Aotecar New Energy Technology Co., Ltd. in August 2015. Aotecar New Energy Technology Co., Ltd. is based in Nanjing, China.

002242.SZ.summary: Joyoung Co.,Ltd provides kitchen products in China. The company offers soybean milk machines; juicers, blenders, rice, induction, and electric cookers, as well as cooking machines; and noodle machines. It also provides kitchen appliances consisting of hoods, water heaters, disinfection cabinets, gas stove, steam boxes, and dishwashers, as well as water purifiers. The company provides its products in approximately 30 provinces, municipalities, and autonomous regions in China, as well as exports to approximately 20 countries, including Japan, the United States, Singapore, Indonesia, Thailand, and internationally. Joyoung Co.,Ltd was founded in 1994 and is headquartered in Jinan, China.

002243.SZ.summary: Shenzhen Leaguer Co., Ltd. produces and sells packaging products in China and internationally. The company develops packaging materials; designs packaging concepts; produces and sells cosmetic and food plastic packaging products; designs and manufactures technological equipment and molds; offers cosmetic additives and cosmetics; designs battery packaging products; and designs and manufactures automobile light weighting products. It is also involved in packaging recycling and RFID tag customization activities; and offers multilayer tubes, injection products, blowing bottles, injection blowing-molds, and coating and vacuum metalizing products. The company was formerly known as Shenzhen Beauty Star Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Shenzhen Leaguer Co., Ltd. in January 2021. Shenzhen Leaguer Co., Ltd. was founded in 1995 is based in Shenzhen, China.

002245.SZ.summary: Jiangsu Azure Corporation operates as a metal logistics and distribution company. It provides supply chain services, including warehousing, sorting, cutting, packaging, distribution, and processing of metal materials. The company is also involved in the research and development, production, and sale of LED chips. In addition, it offers lithium-ion batteries used in power tools, smart homes, new energy power travel, and other products. The company was formerly known as Jiangsu Aucksun Co., Ltd. Jiangsu Azure Corporation is based in Suzhou, China.

002249.SZ.summary: Zhongshan Broad-Ocean Motor Co., Ltd. engages in the research and development, manufacture, and marketing of micro motors and energy vehicle powertrain systems in China. It offers construction and home electrical motors, new energy vehicle powertrain systems drive motors and controllers, and vehicle rotating electrical appliances, as well as hydrogen fuel cell modules and engine systems under the Dayang Motor brand. The company also leases new energy vehicles. It also exports its products to 40 countries on 5 continents. The company was founded in 1994 and is based in Zhongshan, China.

002251.SZ.long_name: Better Life Commercial Chain Share Co.,Ltd
002251.SZ.summary: Better Life Commercial Chain Share Co.,Ltd engages in retailing business in Hunan, Guangxi, Jiangxi, Sichuan, and Chongqing. It offers products and services through supermarkets, department stores, e-commerce, and other retail formats. The company was formerly known as Better Life Commercial Chain Limited Liability Company. Better Life Commercial Chain Share Co.,Ltd was founded in 1995 and is based in Xiangtan, China.

002264.SZ.summary: New Hua Du Supercenter Co.,Ltd. operates a chain of hypermarkets, supermarkets, and department stores. The company has a network of stores in Fuzhou, Xiamen, Zhangzhou, Quanzhou, Sanming, Longyan, Putian, Nanping, Ningde, Shantou, Nanchang, Zhangzhou, and Hangzhou cities. New Hua Du Supercenter Co.,Ltd. is based in Fuzhou, China.

002265.SZ.summary: Yunnan Xiyi Industry Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells automobile engine connecting rod-based automotive components, machine tools, and other industrial products primarily in China. It offers rod assemblies, CNC machining centers, rod blanks, expansion broken links, link molds, ray machines, vertical rocker millings, vertical milling heads, aprons, machine tailstocks, aluminum rods, expansion broken links, linear guide rail gantry machining centers, vertical universal rocker millings, CNC gantry millings, and ream column products. The company provides its products under the XiYi brand name. It also exports its products to the United States, Japan, and internationally. Yunnan Xiyi Industry Co., Ltd. was founded in 1939 and is based in Kunming, China.

002269.SZ.long_name: Shanghai Metersbonwe Fashion and Accessories Co., Ltd.
002269.SZ.summary: Shanghai Metersbonwe Fashion and Accessories Co., Ltd. researches, designs, develops, produces, and distributes casual wear products in the People's Republic of China. The company is also involved in the franchisee distribution activity. It offers its products under the Metersbonwe, ME&CITY, MooMmoo, Me&City Kids, and CH'IN brand names. The company was founded in 1933 and is based in Shanghai, the People's Republic of China. Shanghai Metersbonwe Fashion and Accessories Co., Ltd. operates as a subsidiary of Shanghai Huafu Investment Ltd.

002277.SZ.summary: Hunan Friendship&Apollo Commercial Co.,Ltd. engages in retailing and distribution businesses in China. Its operating formats include department stores, outlets, shopping malls, specialty stores, and online shopping platforms under the Friendship, Apollo, Friendship & Apollo Spring, Friendship & Apollo Outlets, and Friendship & Apollo Appliances brand names. The company's product categories comprise apparel, gold and jewelry, daily necessity, home appliance, cosmetic, and tobacco and alcohol products. It is also involved in the micro-credit and investment guarantee businesses, as well as renting properties. The company operates seven department stores, four shopping malls, and two outlets, as well as chain stores; and F&A Overseas Purchase and F&A WeChat Store online platforms. The company was founded in 2004 and is headquartered in Changsha, China.

002283.SZ.summary: Tianrun Industry Technology Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells crankshafts in China. It offers crankshafts that are used in marine, heavy-duty and light-duty, and passenger car applications, as well as in connecting rods, and castings and forgings; and con-rods, forgings, and precision machines. The company markets and sells its products through a network of agents and distributors under the TIAN brand. It also exports its products to South Korea, India, Turkey, the United Kingdom, Italy, Japan, the United States, etc. The company was formerly known as Tianrun Crankshaft Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Tianrun Industry Technology Co., Ltd. in April 2020. The company was founded in 1954 and is based in Weihai, China. Tianrun Industry Technology Co., Ltd. is a subsidiary of thyssenKrupp AG.

002284.SZ.summary: Zhejiang Asia-Pacific Mechanical & Electronic Co.,Ltd develops, manufactures, and sells automotive brake systems in China, North America, Europe, Australia, and internationally. The company offers brake calipers, vacuum boosters, brake discs, disc brake assemblies, drum brake assemblies, clutch lines and pumps, and other products. Its products are used in cars and heavy-duty trucks. Zhejiang Asia-Pacific Mechanical & Electronic Co.,Ltd was founded in 1979 and is based in Hangzhou, China.

002291.SZ.summary: Saturday Co., Ltd. designs, develops, manufactures, and markets footwear products primarily in Mainland China. It offers its products under the ST&SAT, FBL, SAFIYA, MOOFFY, RIZZO, IIXVIIX, and GAVAKLAS brand names. The company was formerly known as Foshan Saturday Shoes Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Saturday Co., Ltd. in March 2016. Saturday Co., Ltd. is based in Foshan, China.

002293.SZ.summary: Luolai Lifestyle Technology Co., Ltd. researches, develops, produces, markets, and sells home textiles. The company offers sofas, dining tables, picture frames, and jewelry for living rooms, dining rooms, bedrooms, bathrooms, and other household space; bedding, toys, home life supplies, furnishings, and other ancillary products; lace products; towels, bathrobes, home wear, and bath supplies; and fragrance products. It also provides four piece sets, fillings, products for babies and kids, home clothes, toiletries, smart home products, and other products through Dapu.com. The company offers its products under the Luolai Home, LOVO, Luolai Kids, Lavie Home, Yolanna, Sheridan, Uchino, Zucchi, Millefiori, LAVIE PARFUMS, Bassetti, and Lexington brands. It operates approximately 3,000 stores in China. The company was formerly known as Luolai Home Textile Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Luolai Lifestyle Technology Co., Ltd. in December 2015. Luolai Lifestyle Technology Co., Ltd. was founded in 1992 and is headquartered in Shanghai, China.

002327.SZ.long_name: Shenzhen Fuanna Bedding and Furnishing Co., Ltd.
002327.SZ.summary: Shenzhen Fuanna Bedding and Furnishing Co., Ltd. manufactures and distributes home textile products in China and internationally. It offers home furnishing accessories, such as cushions, towels, and blankets; female home furnishing products, including home dresses, home bags, and silk scarves; and customized lady dresses. The company offers its products under the Fu Anna, Visha, Xin and Le, Cool Chizhi, Shengzhihua, and Fuannameijia brands. Shenzhen Fuanna Bedding and Furnishing Co., Ltd. was founded in 1994 and is based in Shenzhen, China.

002344.SZ.summary: Haining China Leather Market Co.,Ltd operates professional leather market in China. The company also operates an online mall that offers leather, fur, suede, luggage, and household items; and provides import and export foreign trade and policy support services, as well as supply chain financial solutions. In addition, it develops residential real estate properties; and operates hotels. The company was founded in 1994 and is based in Haining, China.

002345.SZ.summary: GUANGDONG CHJ INDUSTRY CO.,LTD. engages in the design, development, manufacture, and retail of jewelry and fashion handbags under the CHJ Jewellery, VENTI, and FION brands in China. It operates approximately 1,000 franchised outlets. The company was founded in 1996 and is based in Shantou, China.

002355.SZ.long_name: Xingmin Intelligent Transportation Systems (Group) Co., Ltd.
002355.SZ.summary: Xingmin Intelligent Transportation Systems (Group) Co., Ltd. designs, manufactures, and distributes steel wheels in China. The company offers tubeless, snow wheel, steel, and agricultural and forestry engineering series products. Its products include steel wheels for passenger cars, light trucks, heavy trucks, trailers, and agricultural and forestry machineries, as well as snow wheels. The company offers its products under the Xingmin brand name. It also exports its products to approximately 40 countries and regions. The company was formerly known as Shandong Xingmin Wheel Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Xingmin Intelligent Transportation Systems (Group) Co., Ltd. in July 2016. Xingmin Intelligent Transportation Systems (Group) Co., Ltd. was founded in 1999 and is based in Longkou, China.

002363.SZ.summary: Shandong Longji Machinery Co., Ltd. develops, produces, and sells automotive brake parts in China. Its products include brake rotors, drums, calipers, and pads, as well as heavy duty drums and discs; and hubs. The company also exports its products. Shandong Longji Machinery Co., Ltd. was founded in 1994 and is based in Longkou, China.

002374.SZ.summary: Shandong Chiway Industry Development Co.,Ltd. produces and sells aluminum anti-counterfeit caps and composite anti-counterfeit printing aluminum plates. It also offers combined anti-counterfeit caps, cold-punching molds, injection molds, aluminum anti-counterfeit bottle covers, aluminum plate composites, and anti-counterfeiting printing bases. The company also provides garden planning and design, engineering construction, antique construction, green maintenance, and flower seedling services. The company was formerly known as Shandong Lipeng Co.,Ltd. and changed its name to Shandong Chiway Industry Development Co.,Ltd. in February 2021. Shandong Chiway Industry Development Co.,Ltd. was founded in 1995 and is based in Yantai, China.

002375.SZ.summary: Zhejiang Yasha Decoration Co.,Ltd primarily engages in the interior and exterior decoration, curtain wall, design and construction, home automation, and building intellectualization, and other activities in China. It offers decoration services for high star hotels, as well as large public architecture and high-end residences. The company was founded in 1995 and is based in Hangzhou, China.

002394.SZ.summary: Jiangsu Lianfa Textile Co.,Ltd, together with its subsidiaries, engages in the textile business in China. It is involved in yarn spinning, dyeing, weaving, finishing, and printing activities. The company offers fabric products, such as long-staple length cotton fabrics, texture fabrics, natural fabrics, and functional finishing fabrics; garments, including men's formal and casual shirts, and women's formal shirts and casual wear; and yarn products. It also supplies steam and compressed air; and engages in the thermal power generation, trading, logistics, and water treatment activities. The company exports its products to 36 countries, including Japan, the United States, Europe, and South East Asia. Jiangsu Lianfa Textile Co.,Ltd was founded in 1955 and is headquartered in Nantong, China.

002395.SZ.long_name: Wuxi Double Elephant Micro Fibre Material Co.,Ltd
002395.SZ.summary: Wuxi Double Elephant Micro Fibre Material Co.,Ltd manufactures and sells artificial and synthetic leather products in the People's Republic of China. The company offers micro fiber leather products, including microfiber shoe, furniture, automotive trim, case and bag, cleaning, and ball leather products; and micro fiber suede, as well as microfiber package leather for ornaments. It also provides PU synthetic leather products, such as PU shoe, furniture, automotive upholstery, case and bag, vanity, ball, garment, and glove leather products, as well as PU wiping leather for wine boxes. In addition, the company offers PVC artificial leather products comprising PVC shoe, case and bag, vanity, furniture, garment, ball, automotive trim, glove, and mahjong table upper leather products, as well as semi-PU embossed leather and PVC flocking products. Further, it provides plastic films. The company also exports its products in Asia, Europe, Americas, Africa, and Oceania. Wuxi Double Elephant Micro Fibre Material Co.,Ltd is based in Wuxi, the People's Republic of China. Wuxi Double Elephant Micro Fibre Material Co.,Ltd is a subsidiary of Jiangsu Shuangxiang Group.

002397.SZ.summary: Hunan Mendale Hometextile Co.,Ltd designs, manufactures, and sells home textiles products in China and internationally. It offers suites, blankets, and pillows. The name was formerly known as Changsha Mengjie Quilted Products Industry Co., Ltd and its changed name to Hunan Mendale Hometextile Co.,Ltd in January 2001. Hunan Mendale Hometextile Co.,Ltd was founded in 1956 and is based in Changsha, China.

002403.SZ.summary: Aishida Co., Ltd. engages in the research, development, manufacture, and sale of cookware and kitchen electric appliances worldwide. It offers cooking utensils, including pressure cookers, woks, frying pans, soup milk pots, steamers, kettles, kitchen sets and accessories, and other products; home appliances consisting of rice and electric pressure cookers, electric kettles, soymilk machines, electric baking pans, induction cookers, multifunctional cooking machines, and juice and bread machines; and environmental appliances, such as filters. The company was formerly known as Zhejiang Aishida Electric Co., Ltd and changed its name to Aishida Co., Ltd. in November 2019. Aishida Co., Ltd. was founded in 1987 and is based in Wenling, the People's Republic of China.

002404.SZ.summary: Zhejiang Jiaxin Silk Corp., Ltd. manufactures and sells silk fabrics and garments, and other silk-related products. It is involved in cocoon purchasing and drying, throwing, fabric manufacturing, and printing and dyeing, as well as the manufacture and export of garments primarily under the brand names of BCBG, Max Studio, Michael Kors, UESS, Armani Exchange, Mac & Jac, Marmaxx, Buffalo, Massimo Dutti, Zara, Max & Co., Bimba & Lola, French Connection, Lindex, Kookai, Marc Jacobs, Cavalli, Trussardi, etc. in Europe, the United States, Japan, and internationally. The company is based in Jiaxing, China.

002406.SZ.long_name: Xuchang Yuandong Drive Shaft Co., Ltd.
002406.SZ.summary: Xuchang Yuandong Drive Shaft Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells drive shafts in China. The company provides small drive and tractors shafts, and drive shaft parts, as well as products for pickup trucks, SUVs, and powered mechanical cars. Its products are also used in construction machineries. The company was founded in 1954 and is based in Xuchang, China.

002416.SZ.summary: Shenzhen Aisidi Co., Ltd. provides supply chain services in China and internationally. It operates through four business segments: Intelligent Terminal Products, Communication Service, Financial Service, and E-Commerce Platform. The company offers mobile communication terminal products, digital consumer products, communication service, Internet, finance, etc. It also provides cross-border communications, leakage warning, multi-party communication, flow recharge services, etc.; and supply chain financial services, including small loans and trade financing, as well as commercial factoring and cross-border supply chain financing services to upstream and downstream customers. The company offers its services under the U.you brand through its sales groups and service network in 31 provinces across 300 local networks, as well as through approximately 30,000 offline sales outlets; and eÂbusiness platforms. The company was founded in 1998 and is headquartered in Shenzhen, China.

002419.SZ.summary: Rainbow Digital Commercial Co., Ltd. operates a chain of department stores, shopping malls, supermarkets, and convenience stores in China. It operates 68 general merchandise stores, 81 supermarkets, and shopping centers in 8 provinces and 25 cities, as well as 156 convenience stores. The company was formerly known as Rainbow Department Store Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Rainbow Digital Commercial Co., Ltd. in 2020. Rainbow Digital Commercial Co., Ltd. was founded in 1984 and is headquartered in Shenzhen, China.

002427.SZ.long_name: Zhejiang Unifull Industrial Fibre Co., Ltd.
002427.SZ.summary: Zhejiang Unifull Industrial Fibre Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells industrial polyester yarns, dipped tire cord fabrics, dipped conveyor belt fabrics, and dipped cords in China and internationally. The company also offers cord fabrics, cords, and canvas products; and lithium batteries and hydrogen fuel systems. The company was founded in 2003 and is based in Huzhou, China.

002434.SZ.summary: Zhejiang Wanliyang Co., Ltd. operates in the automobile transmission industry in China and internationally. The company develops, manufactures, and sells automotive products, including passenger car transmission and commercial vehicle transmission for use in sedans, SUVs, MPVs, micro trucks, light trucks, mid trucks, heavy trucks, buses, and other models. It also provides automotive interior products, such as dashboards, door panels, center consoles, columns, guards, bumpers, steering wheels, etc. The company was formerly known as Zhejiang Wanliyang Transmission Company Ltd. and changed its name to Zhejiang Wanliyang Co., Ltd. in January 2016. Zhejiang Wanliyang Co., Ltd. was founded in 2003 and is headquartered in Hangzhou, China.

002448.SZ.summary: ZYNP Corporation designs, develops, manufactures, tests, and supplies cylinder liners and power piston assembly systems in China and internationally. The company provides engine parts, automotive electronics, smart driving products, and smart equipment, as well as international trade services. It offers cylinder liners for the passenger car, commercial vehicle, construction machinery, agricultural machinery, shipbuilding, garden machinery, air compressor, military, and other power fields. The company primarily serves OEMs. ZYNP Corporation was founded in 1958 and is headquartered in Mengzhou, China.

002454.SZ.long_name: Songz Automobile Air Conditioning Co., Ltd.
002454.SZ.summary: Songz Automobile Air Conditioning Co., Ltd. engages in the research, development, manufacture, and marketing of air-conditioners for use in the commercial and passenger vehicles in China. The company offers air-conditioning systems that are used in various types of large and medium-sized passenger vehicles, passenger cars and commercial vehicles, trucks, light-duty buses, rail vehicles, and bus rapid transit system buses, as well as in transport refrigeration. It also provides spare parts, such as compressors, condenser fans, evaporator fans, and accessories. In addition, the company offers repair, maintenance, and technical support services. It also exports its products. The company was founded in 2002 and is headquartered in Shanghai, China.

002472.SZ.summary: Zhejiang Shuanghuan Driveline Co., Ltd. researches and develops, designs, manufactures, and sells gears in China and internationally. The company offers passenger and commercial vehicle, engineering and agricultural machinery, electric tool, and rail transit gears. It provides its products for conventional cars, electric cars, high-speed rail traffic, off-road machinery, motorcycles, ATVs, electric tools, industrial robots, and others. The company was founded in 1980 and is headquartered in Hangzhou, China.

002473.SZ.summary: Ningbo Sunlight Electrical Appliance Co.,Ltd develops, manufactures, and sells thermostats and electric kettles. Its products include electric kettles, coffee machines, temperature controllers, and instant water cookers. The company markets its products in Russia, the United States, Ukraine, Belarus, Poland, the Czech Republic, Lithuania, Bulgaria, Belgium, the Netherlands, Hungary, Sweden, Norway, Chile, Argentina, Uruguay, South Africa, Nigeria, South Korea, Japan, Malaysia, Vietnam, and other countries and regions. Ningbo Sunlight Electrical Appliance Co.,Ltd was founded in 2004 and is based in Ningbo, China.

002485.SZ.summary: Sinoer Men's Wear Co., Ltd. designs, produces, and sells clothing products primarily in China. Its products include men's suits, shirts, and coats; T-shirts, jackets, and long-sleeved shirts; and women's coats. The company was formerly known as Zhucheng Pulanniao Clothing Co., Ltd. Sinoer Men's Wear Co., Ltd. was founded in 2003 and is based in Zhucheng, China.

002486.SZ.summary: Shanghai Challenge Textile Co., Ltd. provides fabrics for men and women. It offers crafted, outdoor, and travel fabrics. The company was founded in 2001 and is headquartered in Shanghai, the People's Republic of China.

002488.SZ.summary: Zhejiang Jingu Company Limited researches, designs, develops, manufactures, and sells steel wheels in China. It offers high vent, semi-fullface, full face, and light wheels; passenger car wheels; tubeless truck/bus wheels; trailer wheels; snow car wheels; UTV wheels; and agricultural vehicle wheels. It is involved in the production and sale of tubeless drop well steel wheels and auto parts; sale of automobile and motorcycle accessories; and provision of services, such as changing and repairing tires, dynamic balance, and four wheel alignment, as well as import-export business. The company also exports its products to Europe, the United States, and Southeast Asia. Zhejiang Jingu Company Limited was founded in 1986 and is headquartered in Fuyang, China.

002489.SZ.summary: Yotrio Group Co., Ltd. researches, develops, manufactures, and sells outdoor furniture products in China and internationally. Its product portfolio includes aluminum and steel products, meshes, wickers, resin wood and wood products, slings, creatop table tops, and glass table tops. The company sells its products under the Das Original, Royal Garden, SunVilla, and Outdoor Essentials brand names. Yotrio Group Co., Ltd. was founded in 1992 and is based in Linhai, China.

002494.SZ.summary: Huasi Holding Company Limited manufactures and sells fur and leather clothing and accessories in China. It also operates stores. The company was formerly known as Huasi Agricultural Development Company Limited and changed its name to Huasi Holding Company Limited in June 2015. Huasi Holding Company Limited is based in Cangzhou, China.

002502.SZ.summary: Huawei Culture Co.,Ltd. engages in the TV and animation businesses in the People's Republic of China and internationally. It is also involved in the production and releasing of teleplay, supplemented by online teleplays; and research and development, and operation of mobile online games. In addition, the company develops IP derivative products; and manufactures toy products. Further, it invests in the culture, film, Internet, industry fund, financial services, and high and new technology industries; and researches and develops animations. The company was formerly known as Huawei Technology Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Huawei Culture Co.,Ltd. in May 2016. Huawei Culture Co.,Ltd. was founded in 1997 and is headquartered in Shantou, the People's Republic of China.

002503.SZ.summary: Souyute Group Co.,Ltd. engages in the research, design, development, marketing, and brand promotion of apparel products. It provides casual wear and leisure apparel products under the CELUCASN brand. The company operates approximately 2,000 clothing stores. It also provides supply chain management, brand management, and commercial factoring, etc. The company was founded in 2005 and is based in Dongguan, China.

002508.SZ.summary: Hangzhou Robam Appliances Co., Ltd. develops, manufactures, and sells kitchen appliances under the ROBAM brand in China and internationally.
