The company offers timber villas for leisure resort clubs, tourist scenic spots, and parks; non-residential timber sheds for leisure or storage purposes, including pavilions and gazebos, etc.; and timber logs. It also provides recreational products, such as play swings, sand tables, and outdoor rocking chairs for children for public parks and private gardens, and courtyards; outdoor furniture products comprising tables and chairs; indoor furniture products consisting of beds and cabinets; landscape garden products, such as flower carts, railings, and litter bins for use in gardens, scenic spots, courtyards, and parks; and pet-home products, including bird houses, dog homes and playhouses, rabbit hutches, hamster cages, etc. In addition, the company trades in timber; and recycles and produces biomass pellet fuels. Further, it is involved in the retail sale of outdoor wooden products through self-operated retail shops. The company was formerly known as Merry Garden Holdings Limited and changed its name to China Environmental Technology and Bioenergy Holdings Limited in June 2016. China Environmental Technology and Bioenergy Holdings Limited was founded in 1995 and is headquartered in Zhangping, China.

1241.HK.summary: Shuanghua Holdings Limited, an investment holding company, designs, develops, manufactures, and sells auto air-conditioner parts and components in Mainland China, other Asian countries, the United States, Canada, and internationally. It also manufactures and sells heaters, intercoolers, liquid-gas separators, evaporators, condenser cores, pipes, and thermostats. In addition, the company is involved in the sale of automotive lubricants; and import and export of automobile air-conditioner parts and components. It offers its products under the Shuanghua and Youshen brand names to domestic original equipment manufacturers and international aftermarket customers. The company was formerly known as Shanghai Shuanghua Autoparts Co., Ltd. Shuanghua Holdings Limited was founded in 1997 and is headquartered in Shanghai, the People's Republic of China.

1247.HK.summary: Miko International Holdings Limited engages in the design, manufacture, and sale of children's and infant apparel, footwear, and accessories primarily in Mainland China. The company sells its products through distributors; and self-operated stores under the redkids brand. As of December 31, 2019, it had 28 self-operated stores. The company was incorporated in 2013 and is headquartered in Quanzhou, the People's Republic of China. Miko International Holdings Limited is a subsidiary of Think Wise Holdings Investment Limited.

1268.HK.summary: China MeiDong Auto Holdings Limited, an investment holding company, operates as an automobile dealer in the People's Republic of China. The company is involved in the sale of new passenger cars and spare parts; and the provision of service and survey. It also provides after-sales services, such as auto registration, insurance, auto parts, repair and replacement, sales and maintenance of automotive supplies, etc.; financing referral solutions; and other value added services. In addition, the company engages in the trading of used vehicles. Its dealership stores cover various automobile brands comprising BMW/Mini, Audi, Lexus, Toyota, Hyundai, and Porsche. As of December 31, 2020, it operated 63 4S dealership stores in Beijing, Guangdong, Fujian, Jiangxi, Hunan, Hubei, Shandong, Anhui, and Gansu provinces. The company was founded in 2003 and is headquartered in Dongguan, the People's Republic of China. China MeiDong Auto Holdings Limited is a subsidiary of Apex Sail Limited.

1280.HK.summary: Qidian International Co., Ltd., an investment holding company, engages in the retail and bulk distribution sale of household appliances, mobile phones, and computers in the People's Republic of China. The company operates in three segments: Traditional Business, New Retail Busines, and All Other. It is involved in the bulk distribution of air-conditioners, and imported and general merchandises; and provision of after-sales, installation, and maintenance services for household appliances. The company sells its household appliances merchandise by bulk distribution to retailers and distributors, as well as operates a chain of retail stores for selling household appliances, and import and general merchandises. In addition, Qidian International Co., Ltd. sells its products through an online platform. Further, it provides community, logistics, and warehouse services. The company was formerly known as Huiyin Smart Community Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Qidian International Co., Ltd. in February 2020. Qidian International Co., Ltd. was founded in 1993 and is headquartered in Yangzhou, the People's Republic of China.

1293.HK.summary: Grand Baoxin Auto Group Limited, an investment holding company, engages in the sale and service of motor vehicles primarily in Mainland China. It also offers after-sales services, such as maintenance, repair, and vehicle customization, as well as sells auto parts and related products; and sells accessories and other automobile related products, as well as used cars. In addition, the company provides auto insurance, retrofitting, and finance leasing services. As of December 31, 2020, it operated 111 stores. The company was formerly known as Baoxin Auto Group Limited and changed its name to Grand Baoxin Auto Group Limited in April 2017. Grand Baoxin Auto Group Limited was founded in 1999 and is headquartered in Shanghai, the People's Republic of China. Grand Baoxin Auto Group Limited is a subsidiary of China Grand Automotive Services Co. Limited.

1338.TW.summary: Hiroca Holdings Ltd., through its subsidiaries, manufactures and sells automobile accessories in China. The company offers various solutions for process design and development, video frames, airbag covers, steering wheel, console, decorative door systems, and outside decoration. It also engages in the surface printing, surface coating, plating, real wood processing, and in-mold injection of vehicle interiors, as well as offers velvet stickers, paste paper, restructuring, and other products. In addition, the company exports its products in Japan, the Americas, Europe, Africa, and internationally. Hiroca Holdings Ltd. was founded in 2009 and is based in Dongguan, China.

1361.HK.summary: 361 Degrees International Limited, an investment holding company, manufactures and trades in sporting goods in the People's Republic of China. The company operates in two segments, Adults and Kids. It offers adult and children footwear, apparels, and accessories for sports and casual life under the 361 core and 361 Kids brands; and ski and outdoor sportswear products under the ONE WAY brand. The company also manufactures and trades in shoes soles; trades in children sporting goods; and operates a gas station. As of December 31, 2020, it operated a network of 5,165 stores under the 361 core brand name. The company also sells products through its 361sport.com Website; other e-commerce platforms, including Tmall, Taobao, and JD; and authorized retailers and distributors. 361 Degrees International Limited was founded in 2003 and is headquartered in Xiamen, the People's Republic of China.

1365.HK.summary: China Rundong Auto Group Limited, an investment holding company, engages in the sale and service of motor vehicles in Mainland China. The company's brand portfolio includes 8 luxury brands, which comprise BMW, MINI, Jaguar, Land Rover, Audi, Lexus, Cadillac, and Chrysler; 2 ultra-luxury brands, such as Maserati and Ferrari; and 15 mid and high end brands consisting of Buick, Hyundai, Ford, Chevrolet, Shanghai-Volkswagen, Kia, Dongfeng Honda, Guangqi Honda, FAW-Toyota, GAC Toyota, Toyota, Dongfeng Nissan, Zhengzhou Nissan, FAW-Volkswagen, and BAIC New Energy. It also provides after-sale services; and sells spare parts and accessories. In addition, the company engages in the brokerage of automobile insurance; and provision of automobile financing and leasing services. As of December 31, 2019, it operated 38 stores. The company was formerly known as China Greenland Rundong Auto Group Limited and changed its name to China Rundong Auto Group Limited in February 2017. China Rundong Auto Group Limited was founded in 1998 and is headquartered in Shanghai, China.

1368.HK.summary: Xtep International Holdings Limited engages in the design, development, manufacture, sale, and marketing and brand management of sports footwear, apparel, and accessories. The company sells its products primarily under the XTEP brand, as well as Palladium, K-Swiss, Saucony, and Merrell brand names. It is also involved in the trading of sportswear products. As of March 18, 2021, the company managed an extensive distribution network with exclusive distributors that operated approximately 6,000 stores covering 31 provinces, autonomous regions, and municipalities in the People's Republic of China and internationally. It also offers its products online. The company was founded in 1999 and is headquartered in Xiamen, the People's Republic of China. Xtep International Holdings Limited is a subsidiary of Group Success Investments Limited.

1400.HK.summary: Moody Technology Holdings Limited produces and sells fabrics and yarns primarily in Mainland China. It operates in two segments, Sales of Fabrics and Sales of Shoes and Clothes. It sells grey and dyed garment fabrics; and shoes and clothes. The company also exports its products. In addition, it engages in the artificial intelligence business. The company was formerly known as Wang Tai Holdings Limited and changed its name to Moody Technology Holdings Limited in August 2018. Moody Technology Holdings Limited was founded in 2004 and is headquartered in Shishi, the People's Republic of China.

1425.HK.summary: Justin Allen Holdings Limited, an investment holding company, manufactures and sells sleepwear and loungewear products, and greige fabrics. The company also provides men's and women's casualwear, and processing services. It operates in the People's Republic of China, the Unites States, the United Kingdom, Ireland, Spain, Canada, and Cambodia. The company was founded in 1983 and is headquartered in Shanghai, the People's Republic of China. Justin Allen Holdings Limited is a subsidiary of Strategic King Holdings Limited.

1448.HK.long_name: Fu Shou Yuan International Group Limited
1448.HK.summary: Fu Shou Yuan International Group Limited, together with its subsidiaries, primarily provides burial and funeral services in the People's Republic of China. It operates through three segments: Burial Services, Funeral Services, and Other Services. The Burial Services segment sells burial plots; and offers cemetery maintenance services. The Funeral services segment engages in the planning of funeral arrangement; and interment, organizing, and hosting of the funeral. The Other Services segment manufactures and sells cremation machines; and provides auxiliary services, such as landscape and garden design. It also offers flowers and related designing services; sales and after-sales service for cremation devices; management services to cemeteries; and consulting services to burial and cemetery maintainers. In addition, the company sells agricultural products. As of December 31, 2019, it had approximately 24 cemeteries and 26 funeral facilities. Fu Shou Yuan International Group Limited was founded in 1994 and is headquartered in Shanghai, the People's Republic of China.

1532.HK.summary: China Partytime Culture Holdings Limited, an investment holding company, designs, develops, produces, markets, and sells cosplay products and lingerie in the People's Republic of China. The company operates through Wigs, Clothing and Others, and Leasing of Factory Premises segments. It offers roleplaying products, which include party costumes and roleplaying clothes, and wigs inspired by animation characters comprising popular animation, comics, cartoons, traditional fairy tales, films, games, and party, as well as Halloween and Christmas holiday themes, as well as underwear. The company markets its products under the Party Time, Secret Temptation, and Styler brand names. It also exports its products to approximately 20 countries and regions, including the United States, Germany, the United Kingdom, and Australia. The company was formerly known as China Animation Culture Group Holding Co., Ltd. and changed its name to China Partytime Culture Holdings Limited in April 2015. China Partytime Culture Holdings Limited was founded in 2004 and is headquartered in Yichun, the People's Republic of China.

1575.HK.summary: Morris Holdings Limited, an investment holding company, designs, manufactures, and sells upholstered sofas, sofa covers, and other furniture products in the People's Republic of China and internationally. The company operates through Retail and Manufacturing segments. It offers stationary sofas and motion sofas, as well as sofas with smart home features, such as audio, massage, beverage cooling, Bluetooth, and USB port connections. The company offers its products under the Morrisofa brand name through its flagship stores. Morris Holdings Limited was founded in 2002 and is headquartered in Haining, the People's Republic of China.

1585.HK.summary: Yadea Group Holdings Ltd., an investment holding company, researches, develops, manufactures, distributes, and sells electric two wheeled vehicles and related accessories in the People's Republic of China. The company offers electric scooters, electric bicycles, and batteries and chargers, as well as other electric two-wheeled vehicles parts. It also provides e-commerce of electric vehicles and accessories and management consultancy services. The company exports its products in approximately 80 countries. Yadea Group Holdings Ltd. was founded in 2001 and is headquartered in Wuxi, the People's Republic of China.

1626.HK.summary: Jia Yao Holdings Limited, an investment holding company, designs, prints, and sells paper cigarette and social product paper packages in the People's Republic of China. It offers various paper cigarette packages, including hard and soft cigarette packets; cigarette cartons; and gift sets to pack and carry various sets of cigarette packets. The company also provides social product paper packages, such as colored boxes, labels, gift sets, and paper bags for packaging drugs and medicines, liquor and alcoholic beverages, and food and other social products. In addition, it engages in the trading of goods, which includes mainboards for cell phones. The company was formerly known as Tourism International Holdings Limited and changed its name to Jia Yao Holdings Limited in July 2019. Jia Yao Holdings Limited was founded in 1992 and is headquartered in Yichang, the People's Republic of China.

1715.HK.summary: Miji International Holdings Limited, an investment holding company, develops, manufactures, and sells kitchen appliances to middle and upper-class customers primarily in the People's Republic of China. It provides radiant and induction hobs and stoves, pots and pans, hoods, kettles, bakery ovens, kitchen cabinets, and other small kitchen appliances under the Miji, Miji Design, Miji Home, and Miji Pro brand names. The company offers its products through distributors, consignment sales, television platforms, and corporate clients, as well as online platforms. Miji International Holdings Limited was incorporated in 2017 and is headquartered in Shanghai, the People's Republic of China.

1728.HK.long_name: China ZhengTong Auto Services Holdings Limited
1728.HK.summary: China ZhengTong Auto Services Holdings Limited, an investment holding company, operates as a 4S dealership company in the People's Republic of China. It operates through four segments: 4S Dealership Business, Supply Chain Business, Financial Services Business, and Comprehensive Properties Business. The company is involved in the sale of motor vehicles and automobile parts; and provision of maintenance and repair services. It also provides motor-related and automobile related logistics services; and trades in lubricant oil and auto supplies. The company focuses on the dealership of branded automobiles, including Porsche, Mercedes-Benz, BMW, Audi, Jaguar and Land Rover, Volvo, Cadillac, and Infiniti; and operates dealership stores of middle market brands, such as FAW-Volkswagen, Buick, Nissan, Toyota, Honda, and Hyundai. In addition, it offers financial services, including auto financing, insurance brokerage, finance leasing, and other value-added services to auto customers and dealers. Further, the company engages in the development and sale of real estate properties, property management, and pre-owned automobiles trading activities; e-commerce platform; and provision of consulting and automobile trading agency services. As of December 31, 2020, it operated 125 dealership outlets in 40 cities across 17 provinces and municipalities. The company was founded in 1999 and is headquartered in Beijing, the People's Republic of China.

1745.HK.summary: Lvji Technology Holdings Inc. operates as an online tour guide provider in Mainland China. The company develops and deploys proprietary online tour guides, which can be purchased and accessed by tourists from its cloud system through OTAs, travel agencies, or Lvji APP. Its online tour guides include illustrated maps of tourist attractions; and editorial contents and voice-over commentaries for points of interest in the tourist attractions. The company also sells customized online tour guide products and services to administrators of tourist attractions and local government offices. The company was founded in 2013 and is headquartered in Guangzhou, the People's Republic of China.

1749.HK.summary: Shanshan Brand Management Co., Ltd. engages in the design, marketing, and sale of formal and casual business menswear in the People's Republic of China. The company primarily offers its products under the Firs, Shanshan, and Lubiam brand names. As of December 31, 2019, it had 1,280 retail outlets operated by its distributors and franchisees, as well as self-operated. The company is also involved in the sub-licensing of trademark. The company was founded in 1989 and is headquartered in Ningbo, the People's Republic of China. Shanshan Brand Management Co., Ltd. is a subsidiary of Ningbo Shanshan Co., Ltd.

1771.HK.summary: Sunfonda Group Holdings Limited, an investment holding company, engages in the sale and service of motor vehicles in Mainland China. It sells imported and domestically manufactured luxury and ultra-luxury automobiles. The company also offers after-sales services comprising maintenance and repair services, sale of spare parts, and automobile detailing services; and other value-added services, such as automobile insurance agency, automobile financing, automobile licensing, and automobile survey services. In addition, it provides logistics and storage services; technology development and Internet services; and sale and service of second-hand cars. The company was founded in 2000 and is headquartered in Xi'an, the People's Republic of China. Sunfonda Group Holdings Limited is a subsidiary of Top Wheel Limited.

1809.HK.summary: Prinx Chengshan (Cayman) Holding Limited, an investment holding company, together with its subsidiaries designs, manufactures, trades in, and distributes tires in the People's Republic of China, Thailand, rest of Asia, the Americas, Africa, the Middle East, and internationally. The company offers steel radial, semi-steel radial, and bias tires for trucks and buses, passenger, agricultural, and industrial sectors under the Prinx, ChengShan, Austone, and Fortune brand names. It also engages in the research and development of tire technology and equipment, as well as provision of related technical services; trading of inflatable products and related products; and provides tire rentals. The company was formerly known as Prinx (Cayman) Holdings Limited. The company was founded in 1976 and headquartered in Rongcheng, the People's Republic of China. Prinx Chengshan (Cayman) Holding Limited is a subsidiary of Chengshan Group Co., Ltd.

1815.HK.summary: CSMall Group Limited, an investment holding company, engages in the design and sale of gold, silver, gem-set, and other jewelry products in the People's Republic of China. It offers gold bars, silver bars, and silverware; processes and wholesales precious metal products; operates self-owned stores; develops software; develops properties; and plans cultural events. The company sells its jewelry products through online sales channels; offline retail and service network; and third-party offline points of sale. As of December 31, 2020, it had 98 CSmall Shops located in 25 provinces and municipalities comprising 4 self-operated CSmall Shops and 94 franchised CSmall Shops, as well as 17 television and video shopping channels. The company was founded in 2013 and is headquartered in Shenzhen, the People's Republic of China.

1817.HK.summary: Mulsanne Group Holding Limited, an investment holding company, engages in the design, marketing, and sale of apparel products for men, women, and children in Mainland China and Macau. The company also offers sportswear. It provides its products under the GXG, gxg jeans, gxg.kids, Yatlas, and 2XU brands. The company primarily sells its products to end customers through its self-owned, partnership, and distributor stores, as well as through online retail platforms, such as Tmall.com, Taobao, and VIPshop. As of December 31, 2020, it operated 1,297 stores. The company was founded in 2007 and is headquartered in Ningbo, the People's Republic of China.

1899.HK.summary: Xingda International Holdings Limited, an investment holding company, manufactures and trades radial tire cords, steel cords, bead wires, and other wires in the People's Republic of China and Thailand. The company's steel cords and bead wires are used in car, light truck, cargo truck, and heavy equipment tires, as well as other rubber products. Xingda International Holdings Limited is headquartered in Shanghai, the People's Republic of China.

1901.HK.summary: Feiyang International Holdings Group Limited, an investment holding company, provides travel related products and services in the People's Republic of China. It offers package tours; free independent traveler (FIT) products, including air tickets and hotel accommodations; and ancillary travel-related products and services, such as visa application processing, conferencing services, and arranging purchase of travel insurance for customers, as well as admission tickets to tourist attractions. The company also provides technical support, business information consultancy, and exhibition services, as well as software research and development. The company offers its products for retail, corporate, and institutional customers. Feiyang International Holdings Group Limited was founded in 2001 and is headquartered in Ningbo, China.

1902.HK.summary: Yincheng International Holding Co., Ltd., an investment holding company, engages in the property development activities in Mainland China. It develops and sells residential properties, including high-rise and multi-story apartments, and low-density houses, as well as commercial properties; operates exhibitions; provides property management services; operates hotels; and leasing of investment properties. The company also engages in medical management and consulting activities. Yincheng International Holding Co., Ltd. was founded in 1993 and is headquartered in Nanjing, the People's Republic of China.

1930.HK.summary: Shinelong Automotive Lightweight Application Limited, an investment holding company, designs, manufactures, and sells precision moulds in the People's Republic of China and internationally. It offers automotive and electrical appliance moulds, including hot-pressing, hydroforming, automotive injection, bicolour injection, and TV injection moulds; and parts processing services. The company was founded in 2002 and is based in Kunshan, China. Shinelong Automotive Lightweight Application Limited is a subsidiary of Shine Art International Limited.

1958.HK.summary: BAIC Motor Corporation Limited, together with its subsidiaries, manufactures and sells passenger vehicles in the People's Republic of China. The company provides luxury passenger cars, luxury commercial vehicles, middle-end and high-end passenger cars, and self-owned passenger cars, as well as electric passenger cars. It also provides auto engines, and powertrain and other parts and components. The company sells its products under the Beijing Brand, Beijing Benz, Beijing Hyundai, and Fujian Benz names. It is also involved in the car financing and automobile after-sales businesses, as well as investment management business. The company was founded in 1958 and is headquartered in Beijing, the People's Republic of China.

1959.HK.summary: Centenary United Holdings Limited operates as an integrated auto service provider in Zhongshan, the People's Republic of China. It sells new and used motor vehicles, as well as accessories, spare parts, car care services, and used vehicle warranty services; and provides repair and maintenance, insurance agency, and other value-added services. The company focuses on mid-to-high end sino-foreign and international brands. It also provides enterprise management information and enterprise investment consulting services. It operates through 14 4S dealership outlets, a quick fix auto center, 5 quick fix service points, and an insurance agency company in Zhongshan. Centenary United Holdings Limited was founded in 1999 and is headquartered in Zhongshan, the People's Republic of China.

1968.HK.summary: Hingtex Holdings Limited designs, manufactures, and sells denim fabrics. It offers non-stretchable, stretchable cotton, and stretchable blended denim fabrics. The company was founded in 1981 and is headquartered in Zhongshan, the People's Republic of China.

1CY.F.long_name: China Yongda Automobiles Services Holdings Limited
1CY.F.summary: China Yongda Automobiles Services Holdings Limited, an investment holding company, operates as a passenger vehicle retailer and service provider. The company focuses on luxury and ultra-luxury brands. It offers repair and maintenance services; automobile extended products and services, including spare parts and accessories, automobile decoration products, automobile care services, agency services of vehicle title registration, and vehicle inspection services; and agency services for automobile finance and insurance products. The company also provides automobile rental services and finance leasing and small loan services; and sells pre-owned vehicles, as well as offers after-sales services primarily through its 4S dealerships, including sales, spare parts, service, and survey. As of December 31, 2020, it had 238 outlets located across 4 municipalities and 19 provinces in the People's Republic of China. In addition, the company provides information consultancy services. China Yongda Automobiles Services Holdings Limited was incorporated in 2011 and is headquartered in Shanghai, the People's Republic of China.

1S8.F.summary: Secoo Holding Limited, through its subsidiaries, operates an integrated online and offline shopping platform in the People's Republic of China, Hong Kong, and internationally. The company provides upscale brand products and services, including bags, watches, women's and men's wear, footwear, children's wear, sportswear, cosmetics and skin care products, jewelry, accessories, home goods, fine food and beverage products, arts, 3C electronic devices, and Chinese original products, as well as lifestyle services through its Website, mobile applications, and offline experience centers. It also offers its Website as a marketplace to third party merchants to facilitate their sales of upscale products and services. Secoo Holding Limited has a strategic alliance with Parkson Group. The company was founded in 2011 and is headquartered in Beijing, China.

1VPA.F.summary: Vipshop Holdings Limited operates as an online discount retailer for various brands in the People's Republic of China. It operates in Vip.com, Shan Shan Outlets, and Others segments. The company offers women's apparel, such as casual wear, jeans, dresses, outerwear, lingerie, pajamas, and maternity clothes; men's apparel comprising casual and smart-casual T-shirts, polo shirts, jackets, pants, and underwear; skin care and cosmetic products, including cleansers, lotions, face and body creams, face masks, sunscreen, foundations, lipsticks, eye shadows, and other cosmetics-related items; and accessories that include belts, jewelry, watches, and glasses for women and men. It also provides handbags, which comprise purses, satchels, luggage, duffel bags, and wallets; apparel, gears and accessories, furnishings and decor, toys, and games for boys, girls, infants, and toddlers; sportswear, sports gear, and footwear for tennis, badminton, soccer, swimming, and other sporting activities; home furnishings, such as bed and bath products, home decor, kitchen and tabletop items, and small household appliances; and consumer electronic products. Further, it provides designer apparel, footwear, and accessories; food and snacks, beverages, health supplements; home appliances; beauty products, fresh produce, and pet goods; and internet finance services, which comprise consumer and supplier financing, and microcredit. The company offers its branded products through its vip.com and vipshop.com online platforms, as well as through its internet website and cellular phone application. Additionally, it offers warehousing, logistics, product procurement, research and development, technology development, and consulting services. Vipshop Holdings Limited was founded in 2008 and is headquartered in Guangzhou, the People's Republic of China.

200017.SZ.summary: Shenzhen China Bicycle Company (Holdings) Limited engages in the production, assembly, purchase, and sale of bicycles and electric bicycles. It offers bicycles under the EMMELLE brand. The company also engages in the lithium battery material, and jewelry and gold businesses. It offers its products through various e-commerce platforms. Shenzhen China Bicycle Company (Holdings) Limited is based in Shenzhen, China.

200025.SZ.summary: Shenzhen Tellus Holding Co., Ltd., together with its subsidiaries, engages in the sale and maintenance of cars in the People's Republic of China. It engages in the inspection and repair of motor vehicles; manufacture and maintenance of automobiles; sale of accessories; sale of jewelry; manufacture of inspection equipment for motor vehicles; and rental and management of real estate properties. It also provides resource asset management services. The company was formerly known as Shenzhen Tellus Machinery Holding Company Limited and changed its name to Shenzhen Tellus Holding Co., Ltd. in March 1993. The company was founded in 1986 and is based in Shenzhen, the People's Republic of China.

200026.SZ.summary: FIYTA Precision Technology Co., Ltd., together with its subsidiaries, engages in timepiece business primarily in China. It is involved in the designing, production, sale, import, and export of watches, driving units, watchcases, watchbands, and other spare and accessory parts; timepieces; general merchandise, jewelry, stationery articles, handicrafts, toys, diamonds, ornaments, and gifts; timing instruments; and hard materials, such as hard alloy and ceramics. The company also engages in the wholesale, retail, and repair of watches and components; distribution of leather wares, pens, ties, tie clips, electronic products, materials, instruments and meters, office equipment, and communication equipment; advertising business; and brand planning, property management, leasing, commerce, and investment activities. In addition, it offers conference services. The company was formerly known as FIYTA Holdings Ltd. and changed its name to FIYTA Precision Technology Co., Ltd. in December 2019. FIYTA Precision Technology Co., Ltd. was founded in 1987 and is headquartered in Shenzhen, China.

200030.SZ.summary: FAWER Automotive Parts Limited Company manufactures and sells automotive parts and components of environment control systems, chassis systems, steering and transmission systems, safety systems, engine accessory systems, etc. in China. The company offers climate control systems; steering and driving systems; engine accessory systems, such as differential locks, electric fuel pumps, oil pumps, clutch master cylinders, water pumps, and throttle bodies; chassis accessory systems, including engine beam, sub-bracket, rear axis welding, control arm, front frame, and oil pan assembly systems; and suspension and running systems comprising subframe-passenger, leaf spring commercial trucks, rear suspension passenger, passenger strut assemblies, shock absorbers for commercial vehicles, coil springs, torque rods, and control arm assemblies; braking systems; and other products consisting of fasteners, airbags, body control modules, grip brakes, torsion bars, brake camshafts, wiring harnesses, sun visors, gear controls, and automotive instrument clusters. It also exports its products to the United States, France, Italy, South Korea, Japan, and countries in the Middle East. The company was formerly known as Fawer Automotive Parts Company Ltd. and changed its name to FAWER Automotive Parts Limited Company in December 2007. FAWER Automotive Parts Limited Company is based in Changchun, China.

200054.SZ.long_name: Chongqing Jianshe Vehicle System Co., Ltd.
200054.SZ.summary: Chongqing Jianshe Vehicle System Co., Ltd., together with its subsidiaries, engages in the research, development, manufacture, distribution, and sale of motorcycles, auto parts, accessories, and machinery products in China and internationally. Its products include motorcycles engines; and automotive air conditioning compressors. The company is also involved in the research, development, wholesale, retail, and processing of mechanical and electrical products, home appliances, bicycles, and environmental protection products. The company was formerly known as Chongqing Jianshe Motorcycle Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Chongqing Jianshe Vehicle System Co., Ltd. in December 2017. The company was founded in 1889 and is headquartered in Chongqing, China. Chongqing Jianshe Vehicle System Co., Ltd. is a subsidiary of Chongqing Jianshe mechanical and electrical co., LTD.

200168.SZ.long_name: Guangdong Jadiete Holdings Group Company Limited
200168.SZ.summary: Guangdong Jadiete Holdings Group Company Limited sells gold and other jewelry in China. The company operates through a chain of jewelry stores, as well as through the Internet under the Chinese Gold Nobility brand. It also trades in nickel metals. The company was formerly known as Guangdong Rieys Group Company Ltd. and changed its name to Guangdong Jadiete Holdings Group Company Limited in May 2016. The company is based in Shenzhen, China. Guangdong Jadiete Holdings Group Company Limited is a subsidiary of Shenzhen Shenghengchang Huifu Industrial Co., Ltd.

200512.SZ.summary: TsannKuen (China) Enterprise Co., Ltd., together with its subsidiaries, develops, manufactures, and sells household appliances, electronics, light industrial products, and office supplies in the People's Republic of China and internationally. The company also engages in the design and manufacture of molds for products; and provision of related after-sales services. In addition, it is involved in the import and export of household appliances, electronic products, electrical equipment, office supplies, kitchen utensils, and pre-packaged foods. The company was formerly known as TsannKuen China (Xiamen) Ltd. and changed its name to TsannKuen (China) Enterprise Co., Ltd. in June 1993. The company was founded in 1988 and is based in Zhangzhou, the People's Republic of China. TsannKuen (China) Enterprise Co., Ltd. is a subsidiary of Star Comgistic Capital Co.,Ltd.

200550.SZ.summary: Jiangling Motors Corporation, Ltd., together with its subsidiaries, develops, assembles, manufactures, and sells automobiles, engines and automobile related parts, and dies and tools in China and internationally. Its products include commercial vehicles, light trucks, heavy trucks, pickup and light buses, SUVs, and MPVs, as well as light EVI trucks and buses, and other products. The company also produces and sells engines, castings, and other components. Jiangling Motors Corporation, Ltd. was founded in 1993 and is headquartered in Nanchang, China.

200581.SZ.summary: Weifu High-Technology Group Co., Ltd. develops, manufactures, and sells diesel fuel injection, exhaust after-treatment, and air management system products primarily in the People's Republic of China. It operates through three segments: Auto Fuel Injection System, Air Management System, and Automotive Post Processing System. The company's fuel injection system products include inline pumps, injectors, distribution pumps, spare parts, and filter products, as well as delivery valves, nozzles, and plungers. Its air management system products comprise gasoline and diesel turbo chargers; and exhaust after-treatment system products consist of catalysts, catalytics, and mufflers. The company also produces and sells engine accessories and purifiers. It offers diesel fuel injection systems that are used in diesel engines for trucks, passenger cars, buses, construction machinery, marine products, and generator sets; exhaust after-treatment system products for the manufacturers of automobile, motorcycle, and general machinery; and air management system products for small-bore diesel engine plants, six-cylinder diesel engine manufacturers, light and heavy commercial vehicles, and passenger cars. The company also exports its products to the Americas, Southeast Asia, and the Middle East. Weifu High-Technology Group Co., Ltd. was founded in 1958 and is headquartered in Wuxi, the People's Republic of China.

200613.SZ.long_name: Hainan Dadonghai Tourism Centre (Holdings) Co., Ltd.
200613.SZ.summary: Hainan Dadonghai Tourism Centre (Holdings) Co., Ltd. provides hotel accommodation and catering services in the People's Republic of China. The company was founded in 1993 and is based in Sanya, the People's Republic of China.

200625.SZ.summary: Chongqing Changan Automobile Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, manufactures and sells automobiles, automobile engines, and supporting parts primarily in the People's Republic of China. Its products include passenger, sedan, MPV, SUV, cross-passenger, and EV cars. The company was founded in 1862 and is based in Chongqing, the People's Republic of China.

200986.SZ.summary: Foshan Huaxin Packaging Co., Ltd. researches, develops, produces, and sells coated ivory boards, chemicals for paper making, and color printing products in the People's Republic of China. It offers ivory board, which is used in various fields, such as cigarette packaging, food packaging, medicine packaging, cosmetic packaging, and living supplies packaging; carboxylic butadiene-styrene latex, styrene-acrylic latex, and calcium carbonate products for the paper making industry; and color printing products, including color boxes, various labels, barcode printing, brochures, books, and periodicals for use in terminal consumption industry. The company is based in Foshan, the People's Republic of China. Foshan Huaxin Packaging Co., Ltd. is a subsidiary of Foshan Huaxin Development Co., Ltd.

2020.HK.summary: ANTA Sports Products Limited designs, develops, manufactures, and markets sporting footwear, apparel, and accessories worldwide. The company offers sportswear, including running, cross-training, basketball, soccer, boxing, winter sports, boxing, taekwondo, gymnastics, weightlifting, wrestling, outdoor sports, women's fitness, and skiing products, as well as sports fashion clothing, kid's sports fashion clothing and sportswear, and leisure footwear products under the FILA, FILA KIDS, FILA FUSION, KINGKOW, KOLON SPORT, SPRANDI, FILA FUSION, ANTA, DESCENTE, and ANTA KIDS brands. It also provides management, product design, logistics, and information technology services; manufactures shoe soles; holds trademarks; and develops and manages properties. The company offers its products through street stores, shopping malls, department stores, outlet stores, and e-commerce platforms, as well as online. As of December 31, 2020, it operated 9,922 ANTA stores; 2,006 FILA stores; 175 DESCENTE stores; and 157 KOLON SPORT stores. The company also exports and imports sporting shoes. The company was founded in 1994 and is headquartered in Jinjiang, the People's Republic of China. ANTA Sports Products Limited is a subsidiary of Anta International Group Holdings Limited.

2025.HK.summary: Ruifeng Power Group Company Limited, an investment holding company, engages in design, development, production, and sale of cylinder blocks and heads in the People's Republic of China. The company also offers structural components of cylinder blocks, including bearing caps and flywheels. It serves manufacturers of vehicles, including passenger, commercial, and industrial vehicles, as well as engine producers. The company was founded in 2002 and is headquartered in Shenzhou, the People's Republic of China. Ruifeng Power Group Company Limited is a subsidiary of Dragon Rise Ventures Limited.

2030.HK.summary: Cabbeen Fashion Limited manufactures, purchases and sells apparel and accessories for men, women, and children under the Cabbeen, Cabbeen Urban, Cabbeen Love and 2AM brands in the People's Republic of China. As of December 31, 2020, it operated approximately 810 retail shops through a network of 7 wholesale distributors, 20 consignment distributors, and 115 sub distributors in Mainland China, and one retail shop in Cambodia. The company also sells its products through online shops, such as WeChat store, T-mall, JD.com, and vipshop; and to other online distributors, as well as franchise stores. It is also involved in the real estate development, properties holding, and trademark holding activities; and manufacturing and sale of personal protective equipment. The company is headquartered in Guangzhou, China.

2101.HK.summary: Fulu Holdings Limited, an investment holding company, operates a third-party virtual goods and services platform in the People's Republic of China. It operates through four segments: Leisure and Entertainment, Games, Telecommunications, and Lifestyle. The company's platform connects virtual goods vendors and virtual goods sales channels. It engages in the provision of services to facilitate digital goods transactions and online stores operating services to leisure and entertainment content providers, game producers, telecom providers, and lifestyle service providers. The company also operates online stores for virtual goods vendors. The company was founded in 2009 and is headquartered in Wuhan, the People's Republic of China.

2122.HK.summary: Kidsland International Holdings Limited, an investment holding company, engages in the trading and sale of toys and infant products in Mainland China and Hong Kong. It offers its products under Lego, Silverlit, BANDAI, FAO Schwarz, MGA, Spin Master, SIKU, Schleich, BRIO, Crayola, LOL, little tikes, NUNA, Aprica, OXO, Discovery, SHARPER IMAGE, TOPModel, NUM NOMS, Dantoy, Poopsie, Sterntaler, Micro, and other brands. As of December 31, 2019, the company operated 774 self-operated retail points of sale, which consists of retail shops and consignment counters; 697 distributors; 16 hypermarket and supermarket chains; 20 online stores; and 5 online key accounts. It also invests in trademarks. Kidsland International Holdings Limited was founded in 2001 and is headquartered in Beijing, China.

2127.HK.summary: Huisen Household International Group Limited manufactures and sells furniture products for home, office, and commercial use in the People's Republic of China. The company primarily offers panel and metal furniture on original design manufacturing and original equipment manufacturing basis. Its products include panel furniture, such as television cabinets, bookshelves, shelves, desks, and coffee tables; upholstered furniture, including sofas; outdoor furniture comprising outdoor tables, outdoor stools, and fire pit tables; and sports and recreational equipment, such as table tennis tables, foosball tables, and pool tables, as well as particleboards. The company also exports its products. Huisen Household International Group Limited was founded in 2005 and is headquartered in Ganzhou, the People's Republic of China.

2148.HK.summary: Vesync Co., Ltd. designs, develops, and sells small home appliances and smart home devices in North America, Europe, and Asia. The company offers air purifiers, humidifiers, essential oil diffusers, and vacuum cleaners under the Levoit brand name; and smart home gadgets and outdoor recreation products, as well as health monitoring devices and personal care products, such as smart fitness scales, smart WiFi outlets, smart LED dimmable light bulbs, digital laser infrared thermometers, and smart nutrition scales under the Etekcity brand names. It also provides kitchen appliances and dining ware, including air fryers, toaster ovens, glass kettles, gooseneck kettles, and food dehydrators under the Cosori brand name, as well as offers a range of cooking recipes on the website, www.cosori.com. The company offers products through Amazon Seller Central and Vendor Central programs; and its websites and other e-commerce marketplaces, as well as directly to other individual or enterprise customers. Vesync Co., Ltd. was founded in 2011 and is based in Shenzhen, China.

2231.HK.summary: JY Grandmark Holdings Limited, an investment holding company, engages in the property development activities in the People's Republic of China. The company operates through four segments: Property Development and Sales, Commercial Properties Investment, Hotel Operations, and Property Management. It develops residential properties; operates hotels, such as Just Stay Hotel and Just Stay Resort; offers property management and health management services; and owns and operates commercial properties. JY Grandmark Holdings Limited was founded in 2013 and is headquartered in Guangzhou, the People's Republic of China. JY Grandmark Holdings Limited is a subsidiary of IQ EQ (BVI) Limited.

2238.HK.summary: Guangzhou Automobile Group Co., Ltd., together with its subsidiaries, engages in the research, development, manufacture, and sale of vehicles and motorcycles, and parts and components; and provision of commercial and financial services in Mainland China and Hong Kong. The company operates through two segments, Vehicles and Related Operations, and Others. It offers large to medium sized passenger vehicles, light and heavy trucks, construction vehicles, and energy vehicles; motorcycles comprising standard motorcycles, sport bikes, scooters, etc.; and auto-parts and components, including engines, gearboxes, car seats, HVAC systems, auto lamps, automation accessories, redirectors, shock absorbers, and accessories. The company also provides financial investment, insurance, insurance broker, financial lease, automobile credit, and other related services; and engages in the businesses of vehicle sales, logistics, international trading, second-hand vehicles, disassembling, resources recycling, supporting services, etc. In addition, it offers investment management services; and engages in the trade of steel. The company was founded in 1997 and is headquartered in Guangzhou, the People's Republic of China. Guangzhou Automobile Group Co., Ltd. is a subsidiary of Guangzhou Automobile Industry Group Co., Ltd.

2243.TW.summary: HORNG SHIUE HOLDING Co., Ltd. manufactures and supplies automobile body-in-white molds and inspection tools. It also offers tooling and technical consulting services. The company was founded in 2015 and is headquartered in Shanghai, the People's Republic of China.

2255.HK.summary: Haichang Ocean Park Holdings Ltd., together with its subsidiaries, develops, constructs, and operates theme parks and ancillary commercial properties in the People's Republic of China. The company operates in two segments, Park Operations and Property Development. The company operates 10 theme parks located in Shanghai, Sanya, Dalian, Tianjin, Qingdao, Chengdu, Wuhan, Chongqing, and Yantai. It also develops and invests in properties; and operates hotels and a small size playground. In addition, the company provides tourism consulting, and construction project design and consulting services. Further, it is involved in goods and technology import and export, marine biotechnology development, financing lease, and property management business; and the provision of technical support services relating to aquarium. The company was formerly known as Haichang Holdings Ltd. and changed its name to Haichang Ocean Park Holdings Ltd. in July 2015. Haichang Ocean Park Holdings Ltd. was founded in 2001 and is headquartered in Shanghai, the People's Republic of China.

2298.HK.summary: Cosmo Lady (China) Holdings Company Limited, an investment holding company, engages in the design, research, development, and sale of branded intimate wear products in the PeopleÂs Republic of China. It offers bras, underpants, sleepwear and loungewear, and thermal clothes, as well as other products, such as leggings and tights, vests, hosiery, and accessories under the Cosmo Lady, Cosmo Elegance, Cosmo Blossom, Cosmo Esquire, Secret of City Beauty, Freeday, Rubii, IlsÃ©e, Ordifen, and Ordifen+ brands. The company also provides corporate consulting services. It offers its products through self-managed, franchised, and shopping mall stores, as well as e-commerce platform. The company was founded in 1998 and is headquartered in Dongguan, China.

2331.HK.summary: Li Ning Company Limited engages in the research and development, design, manufacture, marketing, distribution, and retail of sporting goods in the People's Republic of China. The company offers sporting goods, including footwear, apparel, equipment, and accessories for professional and leisure purposes primarily under the LI-NING brand. It also develops, manufactures, markets, distributes, and/or sells outdoor sports products under the AIGLE brand; table tennis under the Double Happiness brand name; fashionable fitness products for dance and yoga under the Danskin brand; and badminton under the Kason brand name. As of December 31, 2020, the company operated 6,933 conventional stores, flagship stores, China LI-NING stores, factory outlets, and discount stores under the LI-NING brand. Li Ning Company Limited was founded in 1990 and is headquartered in Beijing, the People's Republic of China.

2399.HK.summary: China Fordoo Holdings Limited designs, sources, manufactures, and wholesales a range of menswear products under the FORDOO brand in the People's Republic of China. It offers men's trouser and tops, as well as accessories. The company sells its products on a wholesale basis to third-party distributors and online distributors, as well as through self-operated retail outlets. As of December 31, 2020, it had 336 retail outlets, including 2 self-operated retail stores located in Quanzhou and 19 self-operated retail outlets located in Beijing. The company was incorporated in 2013 and is headquartered in Quanzhou, the People's Republic of China.

2488.HK.summary: Launch Tech Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, provides products and services to the automotive aftermarket and the automobile industry in the People's Republic of China and internationally. It operates through three segments: Automotive Diagnosis, Lift, and Overseas Sales. The company is involved in the research and development, production, and sale of car diagnosis, testing, and maintenance equipment; development, production, and sale of automotive diagnosis, inspection, repair, and maintenance software; development, production, and sale of auto electronic products; and provision of information network services. It also develops, trades in, and sells computer software and hardware, and peripherals; provides consulting services of electronic products and technical; and provides health care management consultation and health care products development services. In addition, the company provides mobile phones and communication products; electronic products development and distribution; chip development and distribution; goods and technologies import and export, and agent services; computer software and hardware technology development, distribution, and sale; computer network projects; computer graphic design; corporate image planning; and Internet information consultation services. Further, it engages in the production of automobiles maintenance machines and equipment, and automobile warranty machines, such as automobile spray booths, tire balancers, tire changers, 4-wheel aligners, frame racks, and automobile testing lines; and development and sale of computer software, information system software, and car sharing technology. The company was founded in 1992 and is based in Shenzhen, the People's Republic of China.

2698.HK.summary: Weiqiao Textile Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, manufactures, distributes, and sells cotton yarns, grey fabrics, and denims primarily in Mainland China, Hong Kong, East Asia, Southeast Asia, South Asia, and internationally. It operates through Textile Products, and Electricity and Steam segments. The company's products include carded, combed, compact, and open-ended spun cotton yarns; grey fabrics, such as plain fabrics, twill weave fabrics, tribute silk series, jacquard series, and khaki drills; and cotton, cotton spandex elasticity, cotton dacron elasticity, cotton and bamboo blend, bamboo joint, cotton regenerated cellulose fibers blend, and other denims. It also produces and sells polyester yarn and related products; and trades in textile raw materials and products. In addition, the company is involved in the generation and sale of electricity and steam businesses. As of December 31, 2020, it had an installed capacity of 2,760 megawatts of thermal power assets. The company is based in Zouping, the People's Republic of China. Weiqiao Textile Company Limited is a subsidiary of Shandong Weiqiao Chuangye Group Company Limited.

2B5.F.summary: BAIC Motor Corporation Limited, together with its subsidiaries, manufactures and sells passenger vehicles in the People's Republic of China. The company provides luxury passenger cars, luxury commercial vehicles, middle-end and high-end passenger cars, and self-owned passenger cars, as well as electric passenger cars. It also provides auto engines, and powertrain and other parts and components. The company sells its products under the Beijing Brand, Beijing Benz, Beijing Hyundai, and Fujian Benz names. It is also involved in the car financing and automobile after-sales businesses, as well as investment management business. The company was founded in 1958 and is headquartered in Beijing, the People's Republic of China.

2B5.VI.summary: BAIC Motor Corporation Limited, together with its subsidiaries, manufactures and sells passenger vehicles in the People's Republic of China. The company provides luxury passenger cars, luxury commercial vehicles, middle-end and high-end passenger cars, and self-owned passenger cars, as well as electric passenger cars. It also provides auto engines, and powertrain and other parts and components. The company sells its products under the Beijing Brand, Beijing Benz, Beijing Hyundai, and Fujian Benz names. It is also involved in the car financing and automobile after-sales businesses, as well as investment management business. The company was founded in 1958 and is headquartered in Beijing, the People's Republic of China.

2BZA.F.summary: Baozun Inc. provides e-commerce solutions to brand partners in the People's Republic of China. The company's integrated end-to-end brand e-commerce capabilities encompass various aspects of the e-commerce value chain, including IT solutions, online store operations, digital marketing, customer services, warehousing, and fulfillment. It serves brand partners in various categories, including apparel and accessories; appliances; electronics; home and furnishings; food and health products; beauty and cosmetics; fast moving consumer goods, and mother and baby products; and insurance and automobiles. The company was formerly known as Baozun Cayman Inc. and changed its name to Baozun Inc. in March 2015. Baozun Inc. was founded in 2007 and is headquartered in Shanghai, the People's Republic of China.

300005.SZ.summary: Toread Holdings Group Co., Ltd. provides outdoor products in China. It offers children's outdoor equipment, waterproof walking shoes, jackets, ski caps, windproof and splash proof down jackets, polar camp down jackets, outdoor running T-shirts, running and trekking pants, hiking shoes, windproof ski gloves, snowboard suits, trousers, backpacks, moisture pads, tents, folding table and chair sets, and canvas hammock and outdoor sports shoes. The company was formerly known as Beijing Toread Outdoor Products Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Toread Holdings Group Co., Ltd. in July 2015. Toread Holdings Group Co., Ltd. was founded in 1999 and is based in Beijing, China.

300043.SZ.summary: Rastar Group manufactures and sells licensed model cars in China. It provides RC and die cast cars, ride-on bikes, and baby safety car seats under the RASTAR and Rastar Baby brands. The company exports its products to approximately 47 countries, primarily Europe, Japan, the United States, Australia, Singapore, South Korea, and Hong Kong. Rastar Group was founded in 2000 and is based in Shantou, China.

300057.SZ.long_name: Shantou Wanshun New Material Group Co., Ltd.
300057.SZ.summary: Shantou Wanshun New Material Group Co., Ltd. engages in the packaging material, aluminum foil, and functional film businesses in China. Its products include smart optical-controlled window films, ITO conductive films, barrier films, self-adhesive switchable transparent films, packaging cardboards, aluminum foils, and aluminized products. The company was founded in 1998 and is headquartered in Shantou, China.

300095.SZ.summary: Jiangxi Huawu Brake Co.,Ltd. manufactures and sells industrial brakes, wind proof devices, and electro-hydraulic driving equipment in China. The company's products are used in metallurgy, hydraulic structure, railway, vessel, hoisting transportation, and other industries, as well as in ports. It also exports its products to approximately 100 ports and wharfs in 5 continents. Jiangxi Huawu Brake Co.,Ltd. was founded in 1992 and is based in Fengcheng, China.

300100.SZ.summary: Ningbo Shuanglin Auto Parts Co.,Ltd. manufactures and sells auto parts in China. It offers powertrain solutions, which include automatic transmission systems; permanent magnet synchronous DC motors; and motor, vehicle, and battery control systems. The company also provides hub bearings; automobile accessories, such as interiors and exteriors comprises instrument and door panel, bumper, center control, and vertical column assemblies; and precision injection molding products, including SRS injection molding parts, precision plastic gears, air conditioner parts, fuel system precision injection molding parts, ignition coils, and speakers. In addition, it offers mechanic and electronic devices consist of seat motors, door and window motors, seat drivers, flexible shafts, electronic control modules, and automobile stamping parts, as well as aftersales services. The company was founded in 2010 and is based in Shanghai, China. Ningbo Shuanglin Auto Parts Co.,Ltd. is a subsidiary of Shuanglin Group Co., Ltd.

300123.SZ.summary: YaGuang Technology Group Company Limited engages in the design, research, development, manufacture, sale, and service of composite and steel-FRP boats and yachts primarily in china. The company provides business yachts, special boats, commercial vessels, government boats, and super yachts. It also offers plan design, manufacture, and maintenance services. The company was formerly known as Sunbird Yacht Co., Ltd. and changed its name to YaGuang Technology Group Company Limited in January 2018. YaGuang Technology Group Company Limited was founded in 2003 and is based in Yuanjiang, China.

300144.SZ.summary: Songcheng Performance Development Co.,Ltd operates in the performing arts industry in China. The company operates tourism resorts and theme parks; and performs art shows under Songcheng and the Romance Show Series brand names. It also provides leisure tourism, live entertainment, and online entertainment services. Songcheng Performance Development Co.,Ltd operates 10 tourism resorts and 30 theme parks in Hangzhou, Sanya, Lijiang, Jiuzhai, Shanghai, Guilin, Zhangjiajie, Xian, Shanghai, Foshan, Australia, etc. The company was formerly known as Hangzhou Songcheng Tourism Development Co.,Ltd. and changed its name to Songcheng Performance Development Co.,Ltd in April 2014. Songcheng Performance Development Co.,Ltd is based in Hangzhou, China.

300151.SZ.summary: Shenzhen Changhong Technology Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells plastic molds and precision injection molded parts worldwide. The company offers high-precision molds, plastic parts, medical parts and consumables, and stamping dies. It also provides design for manufacture, mold-flow analysis, assembly pad printing, spray painting, hot stamping, ultra-sonic welding, warehousing, and customs and logistics services. The company was founded in 2001 and is based in Shenzhen, China.

300160.SZ.summary: Jiangsu Xiuqiang Glasswork Co., Ltd. operates as a glass processing company in China. It primarily produces touch screen cover glasses, thin film battery glasses, photovoltaic coated glasses, ITO glasses, home appliance crystal glasses, and home glass products. The company also exports its products to approximately 30 countries. Jiangsu Xiuqiang Glasswork Co., Ltd. was founded in 2001 and is based in Suqian, China.

300176.SZ.summary: Guangdong Paisheng Intelligent Technology Co., Ltd. produces and sells precision aluminum alloy castings for automobile engines in China. Its products include cylinder blocks, differential housings, gearbox housings, oil filters, thermostat seats, oil sumps, gear housings, lower cylinders, cam brackets, front covers, intake pipes, flywheel shells, oil filter cooler chambers, drain pipe cover assemblies, and ignition coil housings. The company also exports its products to Europe and the United States. The company was formerly known as Guangdong Hongteo Technology Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Guangdong Paisheng Intelligent Technology Co., Ltd. in February 2019. The company was founded in 2003 and is based in Zhaoqing, China.

300178.SZ.long_name: Tempus Global Business Service Group Holding Ltd.
300178.SZ.summary: Tempus Global Business Service Group Holding Ltd. provides tourism and vacation, aviation operations, business travel management, and financial services in the People's Republic of China. The company was founded in 1998 and is based in Shenzhen, the People's Republic of China.

300210.SZ.long_name: Anshan Senyuan Road and Bridge Co., Ltd
300210.SZ.summary: Anshan Senyuan Road and Bridge Co., Ltd. researches, develops, produces, and sells road maintenance equipment China. The company provides snow removal and cleaning equipment, asphalt pavement in place regeneration equipment, and preventive maintenance equipment. It also offers asphalt and cement mixing, asphalt old material recycling, stabilized soil mixing, filling, rush repair detection, municipal sanitation, and other maintenance equipment. The company provides its products for use in the fields of energy conservation, environment protection, and resource recycling. It also exports its products to approximately 20 countries and regions in Europe, Asia, and Africa. Anshan Senyuan Road and Bridge Co., Ltd. was founded in 1998 and is based in Anshan, China.

300218.SZ.long_name: Anhui Anli Material Technology Co., Ltd.
300218.SZ.summary: Anhui Anli Material Technology Co., Ltd. engages in the research and development, production, and sale of polyurethane synthetic leather and polyurethane resins in China. The company's products are used in men's and women's, sports leisure, children's, safety, work, and fashion shoes, as well as sofa furniture, chairs, massage chairs, household and engineering decorations, handbags, suitcases, credentials, stationery, packaging and electronic packaging, ball and sport goods, belts, ticket folders, automotive interiors, etc. It also exports its products to 70 countries and regions internationally. The company was formerly known as Anhui ANLI Artificial Leather Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Anhui Anli Material Technology Co., Ltd. in May 2015. Anhui Anli Material Technology Co., Ltd. was founded in 1994 and is based in Hefei, China.

300230.SZ.summary: Shanghai YongLi Belting Co., Ltd manufactures and sells conveyor belts in South Africa, China, Europe, Asia, the United States, and internationally. The company provides polyvinyl chloride, polyurethane, polyethylene, polyester plastic, silicon, flame retardant, high temperature, anti-abrasive, anti-static, knife edge, and turning belts. It also offers patterns; and fabrication tools, including spice machines, tooth punches, separators, and air heaters. The company's products are used in material handling, tobacco, textile, food, building material, automobile, fitness, agriculture, and other industries. Shanghai YongLi Belting Co., Ltd was founded in 1989 and is based in Shanghai, China.

300237.SZ.summary: Shandong Meichen Ecology & Environment Co.,Ltd. engages in garden greening and rubber non-tire business. It is involved in the garden ancient architecture and municipal utilities engineering, ecological restoration, soil and water conservation, technology development of ecological and environmental protection products, technical services, technical advice, achievement transfer, etc. The company also provides ecological gardening, soil repair, minerals, ecological water management, and air detection management services. In addition, it researches, develops, manufactures, and sells suspension, engineering plastic, and fluid pipe products; and elastic products damping noise reduction, as well as provision of system integration services. The company was formerly known as Shandong Meichen Science & Technology Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Shandong Meichen Ecology & Environment Co.,Ltd. in December 2017. Shandong Meichen Ecology & Environment Co.,Ltd. was founded in 2004 and is headquartered in Weifang, China.

300247.SZ.summary: LeKing Wellness Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells sauna equipment in China. Its products include infrared sauna, traditional sauna, and foot sauna products; and portable steam and infrared sauna products, as well as air purifiers. The company also offers carbon heating painting products, functional sofas and chairs, and SUP and boat products. It exports its sauna products to approximately 70 countries. The company was founded in 1995 and is headquartered in Hefei, China.

300304.SZ.summary: Jiangsu Yunyi Electric Co., Ltd. develops, manufactures, and sells automotive rectifiers, regulators, and other car electronic products in China and internationally. It offers charging, wiper, and motor control systems. The company was founded in 2001 and is based in Xuzhou, China.

300320.SZ.long_name: Jiangyin Haida Rubber And Plastic Co., Ltd.
300320.SZ.summary: Jiangyin Haida Rubber and Plastic Co., Ltd. engages in the research, development, production, and sale of rubber and plastic materials in China and internationally. It offers solutions for sealing and vibration damping systems for use in rail transit, construction, automobile, and shipping applications. The company offers its products under the Haida brand. Jiangyin Haida Rubber and Plastic Co., Ltd. is based in Jiangyin, China.

300321.SZ.long_name: Shandong Tongda Island New Materials Co.,Ltd.
300321.SZ.summary: Shandong Tongda Island New Materials Co.,Ltd. researches and develops, manufactures, and sells microfiber leather products in the People's Republic of China. The company offers sport shoe, labor shoe, and furnishings material, as well as auto, speed tail, airplane seat, and inner decoration. It also provides bags and case, belt, shoe lining, and microfiber for gloves. The company was founded in 2002 and is based in Changyi, the People's Republic of China.

300329.SZ.summary: Hailun Piano Co., Ltd. engages in the development, production, and sale of pianos in China and internationally. It offers upright, grand, and intelligent digital electric pianos, as well as guitars and electric jazz drums. The company is based in Ningbo, China.

300375.SZ.summary: Tianjin Pengling Group Co., Ltd. researches, develops, designs, produces, and sells automotive fluid pipelines in China and internationally. It provides automotive coolant, fuel, air-condition, power steering, and turbo charger hose assemblies; automotive sunroof drain hoses; and automotive molding press hose assemblies. The company was formerly known as Tianjin Pengling Rubber Hose Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Tianjin Pengling Group Co., Ltd. in June 2018. Tianjin Pengling Group Co., Ltd. was founded in 1988 and is headquartered in Tianjin, China.

300391.SZ.summary: Kangyue Technology Co., Ltd. engages in the research, development, manufacture, and marketing of turbochargers for OE engine manufacturers and aftermarket customers primarily in China. It offers turbos for automotive, truck and bus, construction and agricultural machinery, and marine applications, as well as for stationary power in diesel, gas, and natural gas engines; and spare kits for turbochargers, such as compressor wheels, turbine wheels and shafts, bearings, housings, rings, actuators, etc. Kangyue Technology Co., Ltd. also exports its products. The company was formerly known as Shouguang Kangyue Turbocharger Co., Ltd. Kangyue Technology Co., Ltd. was founded in 1963 and is based in Shouguang, China.

300413.SZ.summary: Mango Excellent Media Co., Ltd. provides planning, production, and operation of radio and television programs. The company operates through New Media Platform Operation, New Media Interactive Entertainment Content Production, Media Retail, and Other segments. It operates Mango TV, an internet video platform, which provides content-on-demand, advertising, and membership services. The company also engages in content production and operation; music copyright; development of customized games; and media retail activities. In addition, it offers technology and operation support; integrated marketing; and internet consumer and supply chain finance services. The company is headquartered in Changsha, China. Mango Excellent Media Co., Ltd. is a subsidiary of Mango Media Co., Ltd.

300432.SZ.long_name: Mianyang Fulin Precision Machining Co., Ltd.
300432.SZ.summary: Mianyang Fulin Precision Machining Co., Ltd. researches and develops, manufactures, and sells automotive engine parts. Its products include hydraulic tappets, mechanical valve tappets, hydraulic tensioners, rocker arms, hydraulic automatic tensers, valve rockers, variable valve systems, nozzles, variable valve actuation systems, direct injection systems, VVT and OCV products, piston cooling jets, auto-tensioners, and high precision machining parts, as well as precise components of automatic transmission and fuel injectors. The company manufactures lithium-ion battery cathode materials. Mianyang Fulin Precision Machining Co., Ltd. was founded in 1997 and is based in Mianyang, China.

300464.SZ.long_name: Guangdong SACA Precision Manufacturing Co., Ltd.
300464.SZ.summary: Guangdong SACA Precision Manufacturing Co., Ltd. engages in the research, development, manufacture, and sale of slides, hinges, and other hardware primarily in China. The company offers double wall drawers; concealed, ball bearing, and Euro slides; furniture hardware products; and household product solutions. It serves various industries, including furniture, electrical equipment, financial equipment, automobile, IT, etc. The company also exports its products to Europe, the United States, Japan, South Korea, and approximately 100 other countries or regions. Guangdong SACA Precision Manufacturing Co., Ltd. was founded in 1994 and is based in Foshan, China.

300473.SZ.long_name: Fuxin Dare Automotive Parts Co., Ltd.
300473.SZ.summary: Fuxin Dare Automotive Parts Co., Ltd. engages in the research and development, manufacture, and sale of automotive components in China. Its principal products include pumps and electric pumps, motors, electronic control and automotive electronics, noise reduction insulation, and lightweight products used in steering, transmission, braking, automotive electronics, and body. The company was founded in 2004 and is based in Fuxin, China.

300501.SZ.long_name: Shanghai Haishun New Pharmaceutical Packaging Co.,Ltd.
300501.SZ.summary: Shanghai Haishun New Pharmaceutical Packaging Co.,Ltd. manufactures, sells, and exports primarily pharmaceutical packaging films in China and internationally. It offers cold-forming aluminum foils, PVC/Aclar high barrier thermoformable films, tropical blister foils, lidding foils for PTP blisters, AL/PE suppository laminates, child-resistant packaging, complex laminated flexible films, AL/PE strip packs, and PVC/PVDC transparent films under the HiPack brand name. The company is headquartered in Shanghai, China.

300507.SZ.long_name: Jiangsu Olive Sensors High-Tech Co., Ltd.
300507.SZ.summary: Jiangsu Olive Sensors High-Tech Co., Ltd. researches, develops, produces, and sells auto parts. It offers sensors and accessories, fuel system accessories, and automotive interior parts. The company was formerly known as Jiangsu Hi-Tech Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Jiangsu Olive Sensors High-Tech Co., Ltd. in October 2010. The company was founded in 1993 and is based in Yangzhou, China.

300547.SZ.summary: Sichuan Chuanhuan Technology Co.,Ltd. produces and sells rubber hoses in China. It provides oil cooling pipes, fuel hoses, body attachment systems, cooling system hoses, turbocharger pipes, braking system hoses, power steering system hoses, in and out of the system hose, and nylon tubes, as well as assemblies. The company's products are used in automobiles, motorcycles, and other machinery. It also exports its products in the United States, Canada, Japan, Vietnam, India, South Africa, Italy, Croatia, and internationally. The company is based in Dazhou, China.

300577.SZ.summary: Anhui Korrun Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells various travel luggage products worldwide. Its products include backpacks, briefcases, and sleeves; templates of smartphones and PADs; luggage; and outdoor and sports products. The company offers its products under the 90FUN and GUILDFORD brands. Anhui Korrun Co., Ltd. was founded in 2005 and is based in Chuzhou, China.

300585.SZ.summary: NanJing AoLian AE&EA Co., Ltd. engages in researching, developing, manufacturing, and marketing automobile electronics and electrical accessory products. It provides low-temp starters that include flame preheating devices, grid heaters, PTC, SCR, and glow plugs; AC control panels that comprise electronic, automatic, and manual AC controllers; and accelerator pedals, such as electronic throttles, floor type electronic accelerators, remote electronic throttles, and mechanical electronic accelerators. The company also offers shift levers that include AMT shift handle, MT shift handle, knob type change gear, electric gearshift handle, and AT shift lever assemblies; and other products, which comprises of ATS EGR valve systems, electronic throttles, door and window controllers, and right and left control panels. In addition, it provides transmission controllers, and other electromechanical vehicle accessories, as well as plastic molds. NanJing AoLian AE&EA Co.,Ltd was founded in 2001 and is based in Nanjing, China.

300591.SZ.summary: Guangdong Wanlima Industry Co., Ltd. designs, manufactures, and retails leather products in the People's Republic of China. It offers men and women shoes, handbags, suitcases wallets, belts, gloves, and other products in the People's Republic of China. The company markets its products under the WANLIMA, Saint Jack, OILILY, and COOME brands. It also operates flagship stores, store shops, counters, and other terminal stores. Guangdong Wanlima Industry Co., Ltd. was founded in 1993 and is based in Guangzhou, the People's Republic of China.

300594.SZ.summary: Shandong Longertek Technology Co., LTD designs, manufactures, and sells vehicle air conditioners in China. The company was founded in 2000 and is based in Jinan, China.

300616.SZ.long_name: Guangzhou Shangpin Home Collection Co., Ltd.
300616.SZ.summary: Guangzhou Shangpin Home Collection Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells customized panel furniture in China. The company was formerly known as Guangzhou Shangpin Zhaipei Household Products Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Guangzhou Shangpin Home Collection Co., Ltd. in August 2012. Guangzhou Shangpin Home Collection Co., Ltd. was founded in 2004 and is based in Guangzhou, China.

300622.SZ.summary: Doctorglasses Chain Co., Ltd engages in retail of eyewear in China. The company offers glasses under the President optical, Dr. glasses zÃ¨le, and artificial stone brand names. It operates 318 chain stores, including 304 direct stores and 14 franchised stores. The company was founded in 1993 and is headquartered in Shenzhen, China.

300632.SZ.summary: Xiamen Guangpu Electronics Co., Ltd. engages in the development, manufacture, and sale of LED packaging and application products in China. It offers LED panel lights, LED ceiling lights, LED lights, LED downlights, LED light sources, LED landscape lightings, LED bracket lights, LED night lights; CHIP series; LED backlight modules; and FPC products. Xiamen Guangpu Electronics Co., Ltd. was founded in 1994 and is based in Xiamen, China.

300643.SZ.summary: Hamaton Automotive Technology Co.,Ltd. manufactures and supplies various products to automotive industry worldwide. It offers TPMS systems, maintenance tools, parts, and sensors; commercial car, passenger car, tank, and tube valves, as well as valve extensions and valve parts; tire gauges comprising ruler, dial, and digital gauges; and tire repair, valve maintenance, and tire inflation tools. The company was founded in 1993 and is headquartered in Hangzhou, China.

300651.SZ.summary: Jiangsu Jinling Sports Equipment Co.,Ltd. researches, develops, manufactures, and sells sports equipment worldwide. It offers equipment for various kinds of sports events, including basketball, football, volleyball, track and field, gymnastic, weightlifting, wrestling and judo, tennis, billiards, swimming, badminton, table tennis, handball and hockey, fitness, and fencing and boxing equipment, as well as equipment for disabled and optoelectronic products. The company also provides stadium construction, fitness, event security, and sports facility integration services. The company was founded in 1985 and is based in Zhangjiagang, China.

300652.SZ.long_name: HangZhou Radical Energy Saving Technology Co., Ltd.
300652.SZ.summary: HangZhou Radical Energy Saving Technology Co., Ltd. engages in the research, design, manufacture, and sale of automotive bearings.
