It offers wheel bearings and hub units, tapered roller bearings, belt tensioners and pulleys, clutch release bearings, tripods for C.V. joints, and other products. The company was founded in 1998 and is based in Hangzhou, China.

300680.SZ.summary: Wuxi Longsheng Technology Co., Ltd. researches and develops, produces, and sells engine exhaust gas recirculation (EGR) systems in China. It offers low pressure, diesel, and gasoline EGR valves; throttles; EGR coolers and modules; sensors; and controllers. The company was founded in 2004 and is based in Wuxi, China.

300681.SZ.summary: Zhuhai Enpower Electric Co.,Ltd. engages in the research and development, production, and sale of electric vehicle motor control systems. The company offers motor controllers, car chargers, DC-DC converters, and electronics. Its products are used in energy vehicles, low and medium speed electric vehicles, field electric vehicles, and other fields. The company was founded in 2009 and is based in Zhuhai, China.

300695.SZ.long_name: Zhejiang Zhaofeng Mechanical and Electronic Co.,Ltd.
300695.SZ.summary: Zhejiang Zhaofeng Mechanical and Electronic Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells wheel hub assemblies and precision bearings in China. Its products are used in middle and senior class sedans, commercial vehicles, and trucks. The company also sells its products in the United States, Canada, Germany, Italy, and South Korea. Zhejiang Zhaofeng Mechanical and Electronic Co., Ltd. is headquartered in Hangzhou, China.

300733.SZ.long_name: Chengdu Xiling Power Science & Technology Incorporated Company
300733.SZ.summary: Chengdu Xiling Power Science & Technology Incorporated Company produces and sells automotive engine components for high-tech enterprises in China. The company offers camshafts, damper pulleys, connecting rods, and other components. It also exports its products to Europe, the United States, Southeast Asia, and other countries and regions. The company was founded in 1999 and is based in Chengdu, China.

300736.SZ.summary: BYBON Group Company Limited provides mobile phone aftersales services. The company operates through Mobile Phone Maintenance; Commercial Product Sales, Value-Added Services and Others; and E-commerce segments. It also sells computers, software and auxiliary equipment, electronic products, hardware, machinery; and power transmission and communications equipment. In addition, the company offers communications equipment maintenance; technology extension, computer systems, and mobile phone repair services; and mobile security, member, testing, value-added, and other related mobile services. Further, it is involved in the sale, certification, and recycling of second-hand mobiles and merchandises. The company serves mobile phone manufacturers, business customers, dealers, cooperation stores, shopping malls, individual consumers, and second-hand mobile phone business customers. It sells its products through stores and e-commerce; and operates through 139 branches. The company was incorporated in 2007 and is based in Beijing, China. BYBON Group Company Limited is a subsidiary of Shanghai Bybon Electronic Technology Co., Ltd.

300740.SZ.summary: SYoung Group Co., Ltd. engages in the research and development, manufacture, and sales of skin care products in China. The company offers its products under Yunifang, Xiaomazu, Dadihui, Huayaohua, and Yumen brands. The company was formerly known as Yujiahui Co., Ltd. and changed its name to SYoung Group Co., Ltd. in April 2021. SYoung Group Co., Ltd. was founded in 2006 and is based in Changsha, China.

300742.SZ.long_name: Nanjing Yueboo Power System Co., Ltd.
300742.SZ.summary: Nanjing Yueboo Power System Co., Ltd. manufactures commercial vehicles, passenger cars, power train systems, and buses. The company was founded in 2012 and is based in Nanjing, China.

300745.SZ.summary: Shinry Technologies Co., Ltd. manufactures and supplies charging and distribution solutions in NEV market worldwide. It offers DC/DC converters, on-board chargers, D+C integration products, CDU integrated products, and high power charging products, such as non-isolated type, isolated type, and bidirectional conversion chargers for passenger cars, buses, special purpose vehicles, and mini cars. The company also offers technical support services, including on-site technical support, services network, and lifecycle management services. Shinry Technologies Co., Ltd. was founded in 2005 and is headquartered in Shenzhen, China.

300749.SZ.long_name: Guangdong Topstrong Living Innovation and Integration Co., Ltd.
300749.SZ.summary: Guangdong Topstrong Living Innovation and Integration Co., Ltd. engages in the production and sale of home furnishing products worldwide. It offers wardrobe products; hardware products, including intelligent door lock systems, security door lock systems, and art hardware systems; and ecotypic, bathroom, and hollow doors. The company was founded in 2002 and is based in Zhongshan, China.

300756.SZ.summary: Guangdong Jinma Entertainment Corporation Limited designs, manufactures, installs, and manages amusement rides in China and internationally. It offers roller coasters, tower rides, water rides, giant wheels, classic rides, carousels, family rides, scenery trains, and dark rides. The company was formerly known as Golden Horse Technology Entertainment Corporation Limited and changed its name to Guangdong Jinma Entertainment Corporation Limited in February 2021. Guangdong Jinma Entertainment Corporation Limited was founded in 2007 and is based in Zhongshan, China.

300792.SZ.summary: Hangzhou Onechance Tech Crop. designs and operates FMCG vertical marketing e-commerce Websites. It operates Tmall, a beauty product e-commerce Website, as well as provides product orientation, competitive products analysis, product development, brand visualization improvement, price strategy making, SKU planning, selling point exploration, product selection, hot product making, and other services. The company also offers distribution service on the TAOBAO platform, as well as provides platform contract negotiation, storage and delivery management, platform account period management, distributors recruit, changing or refunding, and other services. In addition, it provides material design, product development, and surprise marketing services. The company was founded in 2012 and is based in Hangzhou, China.

300793.SZ.summary: Cosonic Intelligent Technologies Co., Ltd. is engaged in the research and development, production, and sale of professional headphones. It offers touch panel Bluetooth headphones, gaming headsets, bone conduction headsets, sports headsets, in-ear earphones, and noise cancelling headphones. The company s products are widely applicable in the fields of communications, mobile video, personal audio, Internet, gaming and health and sports, etc. It provides the OEM/ODM services for clients in China and internationally. The company was founded in 2013 and is based in Dongguan, China.

300816.SZ.summary: ActBlue Co., Ltd. researches, develops, and sells diesel, gasoline, and natural gas engine exhaust after-treatment products. Its products are used for emission testing and calibration applications in vehicles. The company is headquartered in Chizhou, China.

300819.SZ.long_name: Jiangsu Jujie Microfiber Technology Group Co., Ltd.
300819.SZ.summary: Jiangsu Jujie Microfiber Technology Group Co., Ltd. engages in the research and development, production, and sale of microfiber fabrics, clothing, and textile products in China. It offers superfine fiber leather fabrics; hygroscopic fast drying, velvet, and cool type fabrics; dustless wipe clothes, clean cotton swabs, car wiping papers, oblique and straight type piece suits, and family portraits; and microfiber bathrobe, swimwear, sports towel, beach towel, sports clothing, bedspread, sofa cover, and textile products. The company also exports its products to Europe, North America, Southeast Asia, and other countries. Jiangsu Jujie Microfiber Technology Group Co., Ltd. was founded in 2000 and is based in Wujiang, China.

300840.SZ.summary: Qingdao Kute Smart Co Ltd. manufactures and sells men's and women's wear in China and internationally. It also operates stores. The company was founded in 2007 and is based in Qingdao, China.

300877.SZ.summary: Anhui Jinchun Nonwoven Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells textile products. The company was founded in 2011 and is based in Cangzhou, China.

300893.SZ.long_name: Zhejiang Songyuan Automotive Safety Systems Co.,Ltd.
300893.SZ.summary: Zhejiang Songyuan Automotive Safety Systems Co.,Ltd. provides safety systems for automobiles in China and internationally. It engages in the research and development, design, production, sale, and service of automotive passive safety system products and seat safety devices, such as automobile seat belt assemblies and parts. The company provides products for mainstream automakers and seat factories. The company is based in Yuyao, China.

300894.SZ.summary: Marssenger Kitchenware Co., Ltd. engages in the production, trade, and sale of integrated stoves and integrated sinks. The company is based in Haining, China.

300901.SZ.summary: Zhejiang Zoenn Design Co., Ltd., a footwear design company, designs, develops, and sells shoes in China. It offers men's, women's and children's shoes and other footwear design services; and luggage, clothing, household supplies, fashion accessories, and other fashion design products and services. The company was founded in 2011 and is headquartered in Wenzhou, China.

300911.SZ.long_name: Zhejiang Entive Smart Kitchen Appliance Co., Ltd.
300911.SZ.summary: Zhejiang Entive Smart Kitchen Appliance Co., Ltd. engages in the research, development, manufacture, and sale of kitchen appliances and stainless-steel cabinet products. Its products include integrated steaming, steamer, disinfection cabinet, oven, and dishwasher stoves, as well as cupboard and dishwasher integrated sinks, and built-in steam ovens, etc. The company was founded in 2003 and is based in Shaoxing, China.

300918.SZ.summary: Shandong Nanshan Zhishang Sci-Tech Co.,Ltd. manufactures and sells worsted compact fabrics in China and internationally. The company also offers business wear. It sells its products under the Nanshan, Dellma, PAUL BETENLY, Bosa Magine, and Mens Planet brands. The company is based in Yantai, China.

300926.SZ.long_name: Jiangsu Bojun Industrial Technology Co., Ltd
300926.SZ.summary: Jiangsu Bojun Industrial Technology Co., Ltd engages in the research and development, production, and sale of automotive molds and parts in China and internationally. It offers roof, steering, vehicle seating, powertrain, interior and exterior, electronic, and door systems. The company was founded in 2004 and is based in Kunshan, China.

300928.SZ.summary: HAXC Holdings (Beijing) Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells automotive cockpit electronics. The company is involved in customization and selection of core display devices, software system development, and sales of supporting devices for automotive central control and LCD instrumentation; and design of human-computer interaction, and user interaction/interface, in-vehicle Ethernet system, and other software and hardware products and solutions that are in line with the development of intelligent and electronic car cabins, as well as other general-purpose component products. Its products and services include automotive display screens, full LCD instrument software and hardware systems, and integrated cockpit display systems. The company was founded in 2013 and is based in Beijing, China.

300945.SZ.summary: MCLON JEWELLERY Co.,Ltd. offers fashion jewelry in China and internationally. The company primarily provides hangings, diamond rings, bracelets, earrings, necklaces, ear ornaments, pendants, and bangles. It sells its products through shopping mall counters and online shops. The company was founded in 2009 and is based in Hangzhou, China.

300955.SZ.summary: Jahen Household Products Co., Ltd. engages in the design, development, and manufacture of plastic packaging containers; and research, development, and manufacture of cosmetics, and personal care and household chemical products in China and internationally. The company offers plastic packaging materials, such as injection and extrusion molding products, and extrusion tubes for use in cosmetics, lubricants, and the FMCG industry. It also provides cream, lotion, cleanser, mask, skin care, essence, and other full range of products; shampoo and bath products; perfume, toilet water, talcum powder, and other products; and laundry liquid and other products. The company was founded in 2005 and is based in Quanzhou, China.

3306.HK.summary: JNBY Design Limited, together with its subsidiaries, engages in the design, marketing, retail, and sale of fashion apparels, accessory products, and household goods in Mainland China, Hong Kong, Taiwan, and internationally. It offers contemporary apparel, footwear, and accessories for women, men, and children, as well as household products under the JNBY, CROQUIS, jnby by JNBY, less, Pomme de terre, JNBYHOME, REVERB, and PERSONAL NOTE 73 brands. As of June 30, 2020, the company operated 1,855 retail stores. It also offers its products through online and social media interactive marketing service platforms. The company was formerly known as Croquis Investment Limited and changed its name to JNBY Design Limited in June 2016. JNBY Design Limited was founded in 1994 and is headquartered in Hangzhou, the People's Republic of China.

3358.HK.summary: Bestway Global Holding Inc., an investment holding company, designs, develops, manufactures, and sells a range of outdoor leisure products primarily under the BESTWAY brand in Mainland China, Europe, North America, the Asia-Pacific, and internationally. It offers portable spas and accessories; range of inflatable water sports items under the Hydro-Force brand; inflatable tubes and sleds under the H2OGO brand name; baby boats, armbands, swim vests and jackets, and kickboards for newborns and toddlers under the SwimSafe ABC and Fisher-Price brands; and above ground pools comprising inflatable top ring, steel frame, and steel wall pools, as well as swim fitness and pool accessories. The company also provides swim gears, such as goggles, diving masks, mask sets, fins, dive toys, and accessories under Hydro-Swim and Hydro-Pro brand names; recreational toys for water, grass, and indoor use; portable sleep solutions, which includes airbeds and air furniture; and outdoor camping gear, such as airbeds, backpacks, tents, sleeping bags, and accessories under Pavillo brand. In addition, it produces and sells polymer films; and engages in the investment management, as well as trades in inflatable products. The company was founded in 1994 and is headquartered in Shanghai, the People's Republic of China. Bestway Global Holding Inc. is a subsidiary of Great Success Enterprises Holdings Limited.

3368.HK.summary: Parkson Retail Group Limited operates and manages a network of department stores, shopping malls, city outlets, supermarkets, and food and beverage outlets. The company offers various brands of fashion and lifestyle related merchandise focusing on four categories, which include fashion and apparel, cosmetics and accessories, household and electrical, and groceries and perishables targeting the young and contemporary market. As of December 31, 2020, it operated 40 Parkson stores, 2 Parkson Newcore city malls, and 1 Lion mall in 28 cities in the People's Republic of China. It also provides consultancy and management, property management, and food and beverage management services, as well as consumer financing. In addition, the company operates as a licensor for the Franco brand. The company was founded in 1994 and is headquartered in Shanghai, the People's Republic of China. Parkson Retail Group Limited is a subsidiary of PRG Corporation Limited.

3606.HK.long_name: Fuyao Glass Industry Group Co., Ltd.
3606.HK.summary: Fuyao Glass Industry Group Co., Ltd., together with its subsidiaries, provides solutions of safety glass for various transportation vehicles in China and internationally. It designs, manufactures, sells, and services automotive grade float glass, automotive glass, locomotive glass, luggage racks, and vehicle window trims, as well as offers relevant services. The company provides thermal insulation, sound insulation, head-up display, dimmable, ultraviolet-proof, water proof, solar energy, semi-tempered laminated, acoustic, heating, hydrophobic, dimming, antenna, heat insulation, lightweight, ambient, light transmittance, coated, and ultraviolet-cut glasses. It also offers photovoltaic and panoramic sunroofs; exterior decoration products; flush styling windows; and encapsulated glass and sliding window assemblies, as well as enveloping edge modularization products. The company was formerly known as Fujian Yaohua Glass Industry Group Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Fuyao Glass Industry Group Co., Ltd. in June 1992. Fuyao Glass Industry Group Co., Ltd. was founded in 1987 and is headquartered in Fuqing, China.

3663.HK.summary: Xiezhong International Holdings Limited, together with its subsidiaries, engages in the designing, production, and sale of automotive heating, ventilation, and cooling (HVAC) systems for sport utility vehicles, pickup trucks, sedans, and heavy trucks in Mainland China, the Kingdom of Morocco, France, Spain, and Slovakia. The company operates in two segments, HVAC Business and 4S Dealership Business. The company offers HVAC components, including evaporators, condensers, heater cores, radiators, intercoolers, oil coolers, and HVAC hoses and housings, as well as technical testing and related services. It also supplies HVAC systems and HVAC components for new energy vehicles and construction machinery, as well as other vehicles, such as light trucks and buses. In addition, the company engages in the sale of automobiles and automobile components, and spare parts and accessories, as well as provision of after-sales services, such as repair and maintenance services. Xiezhong International Holdings Limited was incorporated in 2011 and is headquartered in Nanjing, China.

3666.HK.long_name: TANSH Global Food Group Co., Ltd
3666.HK.summary: TANSH Global Food Group Co., Ltd, an investment holding company, operates a chain of restaurants in Mainland China and Hong Kong. The company operates 55 Shanghai Min restaurants, 2 Maison DeL'Hui restaurants, 22 the dining room restaurants, 1 Oreno restaurant, 1 Wolfgang Puck restaurants, 1 COCO2NUTS, 3 AYO MAYA, and 1 DOUTOR cafÃ©. It is also involved in the management of restaurants; provision of management services; franchise operation; sale of software; and provision of IT technology services. The company was formerly known as Xiao Nan Guo Restaurants Holdings Limited and changed its name to TANSH Global Food Group Co., Ltd in June 2017. TANSH Global Food Group Co., Ltd was founded in 1987 and is headquartered in Shanghai, the People's Republic of China.

3669.HK.long_name: China Yongda Automobiles Services Holdings Limited
3669.HK.summary: China Yongda Automobiles Services Holdings Limited, an investment holding company, operates as a passenger vehicle retailer and service provider. The company focuses on luxury and ultra-luxury brands. It offers repair and maintenance services; automobile extended products and services, including spare parts and accessories, automobile decoration products, automobile care services, agency services of vehicle title registration, and vehicle inspection services; and agency services for automobile finance and insurance products. The company also provides automobile rental services and finance leasing and small loan services; and sells pre-owned vehicles, as well as offers after-sales services primarily through its 4S dealerships, including sales, spare parts, service, and survey. As of December 31, 2020, it had 238 outlets located across 4 municipalities and 19 provinces in the People's Republic of China. In addition, the company provides information consultancy services. China Yongda Automobiles Services Holdings Limited was incorporated in 2011 and is headquartered in Shanghai, the People's Republic of China.

3690.HK.summary: Meituan, an investment holding company, provides an e-commerce platform that uses technology to connect consumers and merchants. It operates through Food Delivery; In-store, Hotel & Travel; and New Initiatives and Others segments. The Food Delivery segment offers food ordering and delivery service through its platform. The In-Store, Hotel & Travel segment enables merchants to sell vouchers, coupons, tickets, and reservations through the company's platform. The New Initiatives and Others segment offers restaurant management system, supply chain, Meituan Instashopping, integrated payment, micro loan, local transportation, non-food delivery, and other products and services, as well as pilot car-hailing and bike-sharing services. The company also offers multimedia information technology, cloud computing, merchant information advisory, online payment, and marketing services. The company was formerly known as Meituan Dianping and changed its name to Meituan in October 2020. Meituan was founded in 2003 and is headquartered in Beijing, China.

36L.F.summary: 361 Degrees International Limited, an investment holding company, manufactures and trades in sporting goods in the People's Republic of China. The company operates in two segments, Adults and Kids. It offers adult and children footwear, apparels, and accessories for sports and casual life under the 361 core and 361 Kids brands; and ski and outdoor sportswear products under the ONE WAY brand. The company also manufactures and trades in shoes soles; trades in children sporting goods; and operates a gas station. As of December 31, 2020, it operated a network of 5,165 stores under the 361 core brand name. The company also sells products through its 361sport.com Website; other e-commerce platforms, including Tmall, Taobao, and JD; and authorized retailers and distributors. 361 Degrees International Limited was founded in 2003 and is headquartered in Xiamen, the People's Republic of China.

3709.HK.summary: EEKA Fashion Holdings Limited, together with its subsidiaries, engages in the design, promotion, marketing, retail, and wholesale of self-owned branded ladies' wear products in the People's Republic of China. The company offers dresses, skirts, trousers, shirts, knitwear, vests, jackets, overcoats, scarves, and accessories under the Koradior, La Koradior, Koradior elsewhere, FUUNNY FEELLN, CADIDL, NAERSI, NAERSILING, and NEXY.CO brand names. It is also involved in the trading of garments and ladies-wear; manufacturing and trading of ladies-wear; and provision of brand promotion, software design, and property leasing services, as well as operates EEKA Fashion Mall, a social e-commerce platform. The company offers its products through retail stores and third party e-commerce platforms; and distributors, as well as direct sales through promotional activities. As of December 31, 2020, it had 1,836 retail stores. The company was formerly known as Koradior Holdings Limited and changed its name to EEKA Fashion Holdings Limited in June 2019. EEKA Fashion Holdings Limited was founded in 2007 and is headquartered in Shenzhen, China.

3778.HK.summary: China Weaving Materials Holdings Limited, an investment holding company, engages in the manufacturing and trading of yarn products and related raw materials in the People's Republic of China. It operates through two segments, Yarns and Staple Fibres. The company offers cotton, polyester, polyester-cotton and viscose-cotton blended, viscose, and mÃ©lange and mÃ©lange-cotton blended yarns, as well as polyester staple fibers. China Weaving Materials Holdings Limited was incorporated in 2011 and is headquartered in Yichun, the People's Republic of China.

3836.HK.summary: China Harmony Auto Holding Limited, an investment holding company, engages in the sale and service of motor vehicles in Mainland China. The company sells luxury and ultra-luxury passenger vehicles under the BMW, Lexus, Volvo, Audi, Mini, Jaguar, Land Rover, Lincoln, Alfa Romeo, Bentley, Rolls Royce, Ferrari, and Maserati brands through its 75 dealership outlets. It also offers finance leasing and insurance agency services; and sells pre-owned motor vehicles, as well as imports vehicles. The company was formerly known as China Harmony New Energy Auto Holding Limited and changed its name to China Harmony Auto Holding Limited in July 2020. China Harmony Auto Holding Limited was founded in 2002 and is headquartered in Zhengzhou, the People's Republic of China.

3FU1.F.summary: Fuxing China Group Limited, an investment holding company, manufactures and markets zipper products in the People's Republic of China. The company operates through Zippers, Processing, and Trading segments. It offers zipper chains and sliders; provides processing services, such as color dyeing of fabric tapes for zippers, and electroplating services for zipper sliders; manufactures and sells dyed yarns; and trades in raw materials, including rubber threads, nylon fabrics, and nylon yarn. The company is also involved in the real estate development activities. Fuxing China Group Limited sells its zipper products primarily to manufacturers of apparels, shoes, bags, and camping equipment. The company also exports its zipper products to Australia, the European Union, Russia, Turkey, Korea, Thailand, Vietnam, Indonesia, and other countries. Fuxing China Group Limited was founded in 1993 and is headquartered in Jinjiang, the People's Republic of China.

4FG.F.long_name: Fuyao Glass Industry Group Co., Ltd.
4FG.F.summary: Fuyao Glass Industry Group Co., Ltd., together with its subsidiaries, provides solutions of safety glass for various transportation vehicles in China and internationally. It designs, manufactures, sells, and services automotive grade float glass, automotive glass, locomotive glass, luggage racks, and vehicle window trims, as well as offers relevant services. The company provides thermal insulation, sound insulation, head-up display, dimmable, ultraviolet-proof, water proof, solar energy, semi-tempered laminated, acoustic, heating, hydrophobic, dimming, antenna, heat insulation, lightweight, ambient, light transmittance, coated, and ultraviolet-cut glasses. It also offers photovoltaic and panoramic sunroofs; exterior decoration products; flush styling windows; and encapsulated glass and sliding window assemblies, as well as enveloping edge modularization products. The company was formerly known as Fujian Yaohua Glass Industry Group Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Fuyao Glass Industry Group Co., Ltd. in June 1992. Fuyao Glass Industry Group Co., Ltd. was founded in 1987 and is headquartered in Fuqing, China.

4QI.F.summary: Xtep International Holdings Limited engages in the design, development, manufacture, sale, and marketing and brand management of sports footwear, apparel, and accessories. The company sells its products primarily under the XTEP brand, as well as Palladium, K-Swiss, Saucony, and Merrell brand names. It is also involved in the trading of sportswear products. As of March 18, 2021, the company managed an extensive distribution network with exclusive distributors that operated approximately 6,000 stores covering 31 provinces, autonomous regions, and municipalities in the People's Republic of China and internationally. It also offers its products online. The company was founded in 1999 and is headquartered in Xiamen, the People's Republic of China. Xtep International Holdings Limited is a subsidiary of Group Success Investments Limited.

55M.SG.short_name: China Meidong Auto Hldgs Ltd. R
55M.SG.summary: China MeiDong Auto Holdings Limited, an investment holding company, operates as an automobile dealer in the People's Republic of China. The company is involved in the sale of new passenger cars and spare parts; and the provision of service and survey. It also provides after-sales services, such as auto registration, insurance, auto parts, repair and replacement, sales and maintenance of automotive supplies, etc.; financing referral solutions; and other value added services. In addition, the company engages in the trading of used vehicles. Its dealership stores cover various automobile brands comprising BMW/Mini, Audi, Lexus, Toyota, Hyundai, and Porsche. As of December 31, 2020, it operated 63 4S dealership stores in Beijing, Guangdong, Fujian, Jiangxi, Hunan, Hubei, Shandong, Anhui, and Gansu provinces. The company was founded in 2003 and is headquartered in Dongguan, the People's Republic of China. China MeiDong Auto Holdings Limited is a subsidiary of Apex Sail Limited.

5LX.F.summary: China Lilang Limited, together with its subsidiaries, engages in the manufacture and sale of branded menswear and related accessories in the People's Republic of China. The company designs, sources, manufactures, and sells business and casual apparel for men under the LILANZ brand name through a distribution network covering 31 provinces, autonomous regions, and municipalities. It also provides management services. As of December 31, 2020, it had a total of 2,761 retail stores operated through distributors and sub-distributors. The company was founded in 1987 and is headquartered in Jinjiang, the People's Republic of China. AS of December 31, 2020, China Lilang Limited is a subsidiary of Xiao Sheng International Limited.

5MIA.F.summary: Maoye International Holdings Limited, an investment holding company, operates and manages department stores in the People's Republic of China. The company operates in three segments: Operation of Department Stores, Property Development, and Others. The Operation of Department Stores segment is involved in the concessionaire sales; direct sale of merchandise; and leasing of commercial properties for the operation of department stores by third parties. The Property Development segment principally develops and sells commercial and residential properties; and leases commercial properties other than for the operation of department stores. The Others segment principally operates hotels; and provides ancillary services. Maoye International Holdings Limited also operates supermarket chain stores; and provides property management and advertising services. As of December 31, 2019, it operated and managed 48 stores. The company was incorporated in 2007 and is headquartered in Shenzhen, the People's Republic of China.

5Z0.F.summary: Zhongsheng Group Holdings Limited, an investment holding company, engages in the sale and service of motor vehicles. The company operates 4S dealerships for various automobile brands consisting of luxury automobile brands, including Mercedes-Benz, Lexus, Audi, Jaguar, Land Rover, Porsche, and Volvo; and mid-to-high end automobile brands, such as Toyota and Nissan. It also provides spare parts, automobile accessories, repair and maintenance services, detailing services, and other automobile-related products and services. As of 31 December 2020, the company had 373 automobile dealerships that include 218 luxury brand dealerships and 155 mid-to-high-end brand dealerships covering 24 provinces, municipalities, and autonomous regions, and approximately 90 cities in China. Zhongsheng Group Holdings Limited was founded in 1998 and is headquartered in Dalian, the People's Republic of China.

600054.SS.summary: Huangshan Tourism Development Co., Ltd. engages in the tourism business in China. It is also involved in the hotel, Huizhou cuisine catering, cableways, garden development, travel agencies, and environmental sanitation and cleaning of scenic spots businesses. The company was founded in 1996 and is based in Huangshan, China.

600066.SS.summary: Yutong Bus Co.,Ltd. engages in the research and development, manufacture, and sale of busses in China. It offers city and intercity buses, coaches, school buses, airfield bus, and special vehicles, as well as e-vehicles. The company is also involved in the import and export trade business; production and sale of automotive parts and air conditioners; provision of tourist passenger, property, transportation, warehousing, and rental services; sale of automotive and accessories; real estate development and management; asset operations and investment management; and development and sale of software. As of December 31, 2019, it operated 200 chartered service stations and 320 authorized service outlets. The company was formerly known as Zhengzhou Yutong Bus Co., Ltd. Yutong Bus Co.,Ltd. was founded in 1963 and is headquartered in Zhengzhou, China.

600070.SS.long_name: Zhejiang Furun Digital Technology Co., Ltd.
600070.SS.summary: Zhejiang Furun Digital Technology Co., Ltd. primarily engages in the textiles business in China. The company offers silk and wool; decorative and knitted fabrics; and knitted and woven garments. It is also involved in the silk printing and dyeing; steel pipe processing and production; and commerce businesses. In addition, the company engages in the development and application of the Internet and big data. Further, it offers pet supplies; and invests in financial, construction materials, film and television, utilization of high-valued waste textiles, real estate, aged care services, ecological agriculture, and other industries. The company was formerly known as Zhejiang Furun CO.,LTD. and changed its name to Zhejiang Furun Digital Technology Co., Ltd. in October 2020. Zhejiang Furun Digital Technology Co., Ltd. is based in Zhuji, China.

600071.SS.summary: Phenix Optical Company Limited produces and sells optical instruments in China and internationally. The company offers optical lens elements, photoelectric modules, and scientific instruments. It offers optical lenses, including BI, FA, ITS, automotive, infrared, and smart hardware/home lens; biological, industry, fluorescence, polarized light, metallographic, electric, and digital microscopes; optoelectronic modules, such as security cameras, endoscopes, industrial cameras, car cameras, smart equipment, smart home, and other modules; optical and metal parts; polymer, aluminum shell, and storage lithium-ion batteries; and other products, such as camcorder camera parts, dish washing machines, disinfection cabinets, and water heaters. Phenix Optical Company Limited was founded in 1997 and is based in Shangrao, China.

600099.SS.summary: Linhai Co.,Ltd. develops, manufactures, and sells motorcycles, all-terrain vehicles, mini tractors, generators, and multi-purpose engines in China and internationally. It primarily offers motorcycle-engines, small gasoline engines, mopeds, forestry machineries, fire-fighting machineries, and sprinklers for sports ground. The company was founded in 1956 and is based in Taizhou, China.

600104.SS.summary: SAIC Motor Corporation Limited researches and develops, produces, and sells passenger and commercial vehicles in the People's Republic of China and internationally. The company also engages in the promotion of commercialization of new-energy vehicles and Internet vehicles; implementation of technical research and industrialization exploration, such as intelligent driving; and research and development, production, and sale of spare parts, including power drive systems, chassis systems, interior and exterior decoration systems, and core components of new-energy vehicles, such as battery, electronic drive and power electronics, and intelligent products systems. In addition, it is involved in the auto service and trading business comprising logistics, auto e-commerce, mobility, energy-saving, and recharging services; automobile-related finance, insurance, and investment businesses; international commerce and trade businesses; and industry big data and artificial intelligence fields deployment activities. Further, the company is involved in the equity and venture capital investment, industrial consulting, property management, industrial investment, asset management, investment management, storage service, and publishing businesses, as well as hospitality, beverage, and catering services business. Additionally, it develops and operates real estate properties; and manufactures and sells electricity-controlled burning oil product and engineering machinery. The company is based in Shanghai, the People's Republic of China. SAIC Motor Corporation Limited operates as a subsidiary of Shanghai Automotive Industry Corporation (Group).

600107.SS.summary: Hubei Mailyard Share Co., Ltd. manufactures, processes, and sells fine wool textile products, garments, and accessories in China and internationally. The company is based in Huangshi, China.

600114.SS.short_name: NBTM NEW MATERIALS GROUP CO. LT
600114.SS.long_name: NBTM New Materials Group Co., Ltd.
600114.SS.summary: NBTM New Materials Group Co., Ltd. produces and sells powder metal structural parts and magnetic materials components in China. It provides car parts, such as car engine, auto transmission, auto chassis, and other products; new energy parts; air condition compressor and refrigerator compressor parts for home appliances; and motorcycle engines, clutches, driven gears, and other components. The company also offers soft magnetic materials, including alloy powders, iron powder cores, and alloy powder cores for use in electric vehicles, charging piles, solar energy, UPS, white goods, and other fields. It serves automotive, home appliance, motorcycle, mechanical engineering, and other industries. The company was formerly known as Ningbo Tongmuo new materials Group Co., Ltd. and changed its name to NBTM New Materials Group Co., Ltd. in March 2007. NBTM New Materials Group Co., Ltd. is based in Ningbo, the People's Republic of China.

600137.SS.summary: Sichuan Langsha Holding Ltd. designs, develops, manufactures, produces, and sells knitted cotton and apparels in China, rest of Asia, the United States, Europe, and the Middle East. It offers spring and summer stockings; medical, men, women, children, and sports socks; and knitted underwear, clothing ties, medical and sanitary materials and dressings, cotton products, and knitted fabrics. The company also provides skin care products. Sichuan Langsha Holding Ltd. sells its products through approximately 2,000 specialty stores; 100,000 sales terminal outlets; and online. The company was formerly known as Sichuan Changjiang Packaging Holding Co., Ltd. Sichuan Langsha Holding Ltd. was founded in 1995 and is based in Yibin, China.

600138.SS.short_name: CHINA CYTS TOURS HOLDING CO. LT
600138.SS.long_name: China Cyts Tours Holding Co., Ltd.
600138.SS.summary: China Cyts Tours Holding Co., Ltd. operates as a tour operator in China. It offers inbound, domestic, and outbound travel services; conferences and exhibitions services; and technical support, travel-affiliated resources development, and online information services. The company also operates ChinaTravelDepot.com, a travel Website that offers a range of travel services, such as tour packages, cruise, hotel, flight, car rental, and international travel services; and offers airport transfer, tour guides, and fleet of luxury buses. It operates through a network of approximately 60 chain stores and outlets in China, as well as 3 branch offices in Hong Kong, Japan, and North America. The company was founded in 1980 and is headquartered in Beijing, China.

600148.SS.summary: Changchun Yidong Clutch CO.,LTD engages in the development, production, and sales of automobile clutches in China and internationally. Its products include clutches, including driven desk and cover assembly products; and hydraulic lifting products, such as hydraulic locks and cylinders, and manual and electric pumps. The company was founded in 1992 and is based in Changchun, China.

600151.SS.long_name: Shanghai Aerospace Automobile Electromechanical Co., Ltd.
600151.SS.summary: Shanghai Aerospace Automobile Electromechanical Co., Ltd. develops, sells, and installs aerospace photovoltaic products in China and internationally. It also engages in the sale of solar cells and modules; marketing and industrial platform management; provision of design and installation contracting services for photovoltaic distributed systems; and provision of photovoltaic and energy storage system integration services. In addition, the company provides various automobile thermal systems, such as automobile HVAC modules, powertrain cooling modules, charge air coolers, liquid cooled condensers, radiators, T&C evaporators, fixed swashplate compressors, variable swashplate compressors, oil coolers, HCAC controllers, and automatic control panels. Further, it provides research and development, production, and sale of application products in the civil-military integration fields. The company was founded in 1998 and is based in Shanghai, China.

600156.SS.summary: Hunan Huasheng Co.,Ltd produces and sells ramie/linen textiles and garments in China. The company provides ramie yarns and clothing products. It also produces and sells pharmaceutical machinery and equipment. The company also exports its products to the European Union, the United States, Japan, South Korea, South America, and other countries and regions. Hunan Huasheng Co.,Ltd was founded in 1998 and is based in Changsha, China.

600166.SS.summary: Beiqi Foton Motor Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells commercial vehicles worldwide. The company offers passenger vehicles, such as vans, pickups, and SUVs; light-duty trucks; medium and heavy-duty trucks; and buses and coaches. It also provides Total Care, parts, and financing services. The company was founded in 1996 and is headquartered in Beijing, China.

600177.SS.summary: Youngor Group Co.,Ltd engages in the real estate development and financial investment activities in China and internationally. The company develops real estate properties in Shanghai, Ningbo, Suzhou, and Hangzhou, as well as offers hotel management, tourism development, health care, and other related services. It also engages in wool, hemp, and cotton spinning business; and designs and manufactures formal wear, casual shirts, T-shirts, and trousers. In addition, the company engages in the trading of oil, chemical products, iron and steel, non-ferrous metals, and agricultural products; auto trading business; and logistics business. Youngor Group Co.,Ltd was founded in 1979 and is based in Ningbo, China.

600182.SS.summary: Giti Tire Corporation produces and sells automobile tires. The company was formerly known as Hualin Tyre Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Giti Tire Corporation in May 2005. Giti Tire Corporation was founded in 1993 and is headquartered in Shanghai, China.

600210.SS.long_name: Shanghai Zijiang Enterprise Group Co., Ltd.
600210.SS.summary: Shanghai Zijiang Enterprise Group Co., Ltd. operates in the packaging and printing industry in China. The company offers PET performs and bottles, crown caps, plastic labels, sanitary article packaging products, PP closures, metallization paper and film products, printing ink products, plastic printing products, pail and jerry cans, film products, beverage products, paper printing products, and magnesium products, as well as BOPET and CPP films, PA film inks, and plastic containers for industrial products. It is also involved in the construction of scientific parks; and real estate activities. The company is based in Shanghai, China.

600213.SS.long_name: Yangzhou Yaxing Motor Coach Co., Ltd.
600213.SS.summary: Yangzhou Yaxing Motor Coach Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells coaches in China. It offers intercity, school, high-end tour, and urban buses, as well as city and special buses; private coaches; luxury limos; special vehicles; and other environment-friendly and energy-saving buses under the Asiastar, FTBCI, and Yangtze brand names. The company also exports its products to Europe, North America, Australia, Southeast Asia, Russia, the Middle East, Africa, and other countries. Yangzhou Yaxing Motor Coach Co., Ltd. was founded in 1949 and is based in Yangzhou, China.

600218.SS.summary: Anhui Quanchai Engine Co., Ltd. researches, develops, manufactures, and sells diesel engines in China, Southeast Asia, Europe, and internationally. Its products include vehicle diesel, low-speed truck diesel, non road diesel, fire fighting/water pump, and generator engines. The company provides diesel engines for automobiles, forklifts, agricultural equipment, construction machineries, and generating sets. Anhui Quanchai Engine Co., Ltd. was founded in 1998 and is based in Chuzhou, China.

600241.SS.summary: Liaoning Shidai Wanheng Co.,Ltd. imports and exports clothing and apparel products. The company offers its clothing products under the bee and butterfly trademarks. It is also involved in the provision of clothing processing, fabric printing and dyeing, and freight forwarding services. In addition, the company engages in the development and sale of real estate properties; and equity investment activities. The company sells its products to approximately 60 countries and regions, including Europe, the United States, Japan, and Southeast Asia. The company was formerly known as Liaoning Clothing Import and Export Company. The company was founded in 1955 and is based in Dalian, China.

600258.SS.summary: BTG Hotels (Group) Co., Ltd. engages in the operation and management of hotels in the People's Republic of China. The company was formerly known as Beijing Capital Tourism Co.,Ltd. and changed its name to BTG Hotels (Group) Co., Ltd. in August 2013. The company was founded in 1999 and is headquartered in Beijing, the People's Republic of China. BTG Hotels (Group) Co., Ltd. operates as a subsidiary of Beijing Tourism Group.

600280.SS.long_name: Nanjing Central Emporium (Group) Stocks Co., Ltd.
600280.SS.summary: Nanjing Central Emporium (Group) Stocks Co., Ltd. operates department stores. It operates a chain of 14 department stores, as well as an e-commerce online shopping platform. The company is also involved in the development of commercial properties. The company was founded in 1936 and is based in Nanjing, China.

600295.SS.summary: Inner Mongolia Erdos Resources Co.,ltd. engages in garment, energy, chemical, metallurgy, and other businesses in China. The company provides plush products, cashmere yarns, cashmere sweaters, and other seasonal products. It also offers ferrosilicon, silicon manganese alloy, coal, caustic soda, calcium carbide, and PVC resins. The company was formerly known as Inner Mongolia Eerduosi Resources Co.,Ltd. and changed its name to Inner Mongolia Erdos Resources Co.,ltd. in June 2011. Inner Mongolia Erdos Resources Co.,ltd. was incorporated in 2000 and is based in Ordos, China.

600303.SS.long_name: Liaoning SG Automotive Group Co., Ltd.
600303.SS.summary: Liaoning SG Automotive Group Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells automobiles, axles, and components in China. The company offers city, coach, school, commuter, city feeder, electric, and hybrid buses; SUVs, CUVs, and pickup trucks; and special vehicles, including container transporters, warehouse gate semi-trailers, gate semi-trailers, multipurpose fire engines, and van products. It also provides sedan chassis products, light-duty axles, and heavy-duty axles, as well as components, including slip yokes, pinion flanges, gears, tubes, steering knuckles, various types of shaft, hollow axle shafts, axle shafts for rear drive axles, stub axle shafts for front drive axles, split-type Diff cases, and carrier housings. The company offers its vehicles under the Huanghai brand, and axles and components under the SG brand. Liaoning SG Automotive Group Co., Ltd. was founded in 1984 and is headquartered in Dandong, China.

600327.SS.long_name: Wuxi Commercial Mansion Grand Orient Co., Ltd.
600327.SS.summary: Wuxi Commercial Mansion Grand Orient Co., Ltd. primarily engages in the sale and service of automobiles in China. The company operates 46 car stores in Wuxi and surrounding cities. It also provides car repair and maintenance services, as well as supplies automotive products. In addition, the company operates department stores, supermarkets, and restaurants; sells cooked food products to approximately 20 large and medium-sized enterprises; and offers catering services. Wuxi Commercial Mansion Grand Orient Co., Ltd. is based in Wuxi, China.

600337.SS.long_name: Markor International Home Furnishings Co., Ltd.
600337.SS.summary: Markor International Home Furnishings Co., Ltd. designs, develops, produces, and sells home furniture products. It operates and franchises 258 retail stores under the Markor Home Furnishings, A.R.T., A.R.T. West Side, Caracole, YVVY, Zest Home, and Rehome, as well as Jonathan Charles and Rowe brands in 95 cities in China and internationally. The company was formerly known as Markor International Furniture Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Markor International Home Furnishings Co., Ltd. in July 2014. Markor International Home Furnishings Co., Ltd. was founded in 1990 and is based in Urumqi, China.

600346.SS.summary: Hengli Petrochemical Co.,Ltd. engages in the petrochemical business. It produces and sells petroleum and intermediate petrochemical products, as well as synthetic fibers. The company was founded in 1999 and is based in Dalian, China.

600370.SS.summary: Jiangsu Sanfangxiang Industry Co., Ltd engages in the chemical fiber, textiles, printed and dyed fabrics, and chemical businesses. Its products include canvas materials, chemical fibers, plastic engineering parts, and tarpaulins and canvas products, as well as corduroy, cotton and linen blended, nylon, plain cotton, poplin, printed cotton, ramie, rayon, satin/satinette, stretch, twill, and woven fabrics; and industrial used plastics/polymers/resins. Jiangsu Sanfangxiang Industry Co., Ltd was founded in 1994 and is based in Jiangyin, China.

600386.SS.summary: Beijing Bashi Media Co., Ltd. engages in the media, automobile services, and investment and financing businesses. The company was formerly known as Beijing Bus Co., Ltd. Beijing Bashi Media Co., Ltd. was founded in 1999 and is based in Beijing, China. Beijing Bashi Media Co., Ltd. is a subsidiary of Beijing Public Transport Holdings (Group) Ltd.

600398.SS.summary: Hla Group Corp.,LTD., a garment company, manufactures and sells suits and professional clothing products. The company offers men's, women's, and children's clothing, as well as accessories and home furniture. It provides its clothing products under the brands, such as HLA, Sancanal, EICHITOO, EICHITOO KIDS, HLA JEANS, Heilan Home, AEX, and OVV. The company was formerly known as HLA CORP., Ltd. and changed its name to Hla Group Corp.,LTD. in March 2021. Hla Group Corp.,LTD. was founded in 1997 and is based in Jiangyin, China.

600400.SS.summary: Jiangsu Hongdou Industrial Co., Ltd manufactures and sells clothing products. The company's clothing products include men's suits, shirts, T-shirts, jackets, trousers, and sweaters. The company was founded in 1995 and is based in Wuxi, China.

600418.SS.summary: Anhui Jianghuai Automobile Group Corp.,Ltd. manufactures and sells commercial vehicles and passenger cars in the People's Republic of China and internationally. The company offers light, medium, and heavy-duty trucks; vans; sedans; IEVs; SUVs; MPVs; SRVs; pick-ups; bus chassis; engineering machinery; gearboxes; and engines, as well as electric vehicles. It exports its products to South America, Europe, Africa, Asia, and other regions. The company was formerly known as Anhui Jianghuai Automobile Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Anhui Jianghuai Automobile Group Corp.,Ltd. in November 2016. Anhui Jianghuai Automobile Group Corp.,Ltd. was founded in 1964 and is based in Hefei, the People's Republic of China.

600421.SS.summary: Hubei Huarong Holding Co.,Ltd. produces and distributes pharmaceutical products in China. The company's principal pharmaceutical products include Gucining Capsules and Huoxue Tongmai Capsules. It also develops biological products, pharmaceuticals, environment-protection, and agricultural products, as well as related technologies. The company was formerly known as Hubei Yangfan Holding Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Hubei Huarong Holding Co.,Ltd. in November 2020. Hubei Huarong Holding Co.,Ltd. was founded in 1997 and is headquartered in Wuhan, China.

600448.SS.summary: Huafang Co., Ltd. operates in the textile printing and dyeing industry in China and internationally. It offers home textiles, fabrics, bedding, clothing, blue platinum, and fiber series products. The company is also involved in the thermal power, real estate, financial, and information service businesses. Huafang Co., Ltd. was founded in 1976 and is based in Binzhou, China.

600469.SS.summary: Aeolus Tyre Co., Ltd. engages in the manufacture and sale of tires for trucks, buses, earthmoving, and agricultural machinery. The company was founded in 1965 and is headquartered in Jiaozuo, China.

600493.SS.long_name: Fujian Fynex Textile Science & Technology Co., Ltd.
600493.SS.summary: Fujian Fynex Textile Science & Technology Co., Ltd. engages in the production, dyeing, finishing, and sale of knitted fabrics and tube dyed yarns primarily in China. The company offers member products; imitation cotton, segment-color yarn, mercerized cotton, CDP, pique, ordinary, and functional series dyeing products; printing series products; and stripes terry toweling products. It also exports its products. The company was founded in 1991 and is based in Jinjiang, China.

600501.SS.summary: Aerosun Corporation manufactures and sells special purpose vehicles in China and internationally. The company offers special vehicle products, such as aircraft refueller, oil refueller, and other fuel transportation vehicles; and sanitation vehicles, including compression garbage, garbage dump, detachable container garbage, road sweeper, washing sweeper, flushing vehicle, high pressure washing, sewerage collect, and fertilizer collection vehicles. It also provides flexible piping products, such as expansion joints and reinforced thermal plastic piping products; pressure vessel products; and art engineering products. In addition, the company offers metal hoses, which are used in various fields, such as automobile, air conditioner, construction, gas, and decration. Further, it develops and produces mobile satellite communication systems, laser gyro, and other related products. Aerosun Corporation was founded in 1999 and is headquartered in Nanjing, China.

600510.SS.summary: Black Peony (Group) Co., Ltd. engages in the construction and textile businesses in China and internationally. It is also involved in the manufacture and sale of denim fabric, yarn-dyed-fabrics, khaki, corduroy, and other casual wear; and real estate development business. In addition, the company imports and exports various goods, industrial products, textiles, labor supplies, household goods, department store products, hardware products, electrical goods, and decoration materials. It also exports its textile products to the United States, Japan, Russia, Hong Kong, Australia, and internationally. The company was formerly known as Changzhou Second Sezhi Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Black Peony (Group) Co., Ltd. in March 1995. The company was founded in 1940 and is based in Changzhou, China. Black Peony (Group) Co., Ltd. is a subsidiary of Changzhou Hi-tech Group Co., Ltd.

600523.SS.summary: Guizhou Guihang Automotive Components Co.,Ltd develops, manufactures, and distributes automobile and motorcycle components in China and internationally. Its automobile components include air filter and radiator series; car key assembly and switch series; and automobile door and window glass lifters, as well as aerospace product series and plastic extrusions. The company exports its products. It also engages in the technology development and research activities. Guizhou Guihang Automotive Components Co.,Ltd is headquartered in Guiyang, China.

600555.SS.summary: HNA Innovation Co., Ltd. provides tourism catering services in China. It engages in the development, construction, and operation of scenic spots in tourist resorts. The company also engages in the real estate business; management of tourist attractions and hotels; and yacht sales business. In addition, it provides investment management, marketing planning, exhibition, conference service, and business management consulting services; business information consulting services; sports activity organizations planning services; energy-saving services; and software development and information technology consulting services. The company was formerly known as HNA Innovation (Hainan) Co., Ltd. and changed its name to HNA Innovation Co., Ltd. in April 2017. HNA Innovation Co., Ltd. was incorporated in 1999 and is based in Sanya, China.

600562.SS.summary: Glarun Technology Co., Ltd. engages in the manufacture and sale of ceramic and related products in China and internationally. It offers ceramic tableware, tea sets, bottles, and cups; art plates; and porcelain products for offices and hotels. The company also provides environmental protection equipment; and packaging materials and products. Glarun Technology Co., Ltd. is based in Nanjing, China.

600565.SS.summary: DIMA HOLDINGS Co. ,Ltd. engages in the manufacture and sale of special vehicles in China. It offers bulletproof cash trucks, communication command vehicles, emergency communication vehicles, professional work vehicles, logistics support vehicles, radio and television work vehicles, and mobile police cars. The company also exports its vehicles. DIMA HOLDINGS Co. ,Ltd. was founded in 1997 and is based in Chongqing, China.

600593.SS.summary: Dalian Sunasia Tourism Holding CO.,LTD operates theme parks in China. The company was founded in 1994 and is based in Dalian, China.

600609.SS.summary: Shenyang Jinbei Automotive Company Limited engages in the development, manufacture, and distribution of automobiles and automobile spare parts in China. It offers light trucks and automobile spare parts under the Jinbei brand name. The company also distributes its products to Brazil, Malaysia, the Philippines, Vietnam, and others. Shenyang Jinbei Automotive Company Limited is headquartered in Shenyang, China.

600612.SS.summary: Lao Feng Xiang Co., Ltd. operates in the jewelry industry in the People's Republic of China and internationally. It researches, develops, designs, produces, and sells gold, silver, platinum, diamonds, jade, pearls, gold inlays, colored gemstones, enamel, red coral, and other jewelry, as well as dental carvings, K gold glasses, and travel craft souvenirs. The company was formerly known as China First Pencil Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Lao Feng Xiang Co., Ltd. in July 2009. Lao Feng Xiang Co., Ltd. was founded in 1848 and is based in Shanghai, the People's Republic of China.

600626.SS.summary: Shanghai Shenda Co., Ltd engages in the import and export trading of textile products in China. It is involved in the design, research and development, production organization, quality control, custom, and commodity inspection fund of upstream customers. The company also offers automotive blanks, molding blankets, ceiling fabrics, seat fabrics, safety belts, etc. In addition, it provides biogas and architectural membrane structures, waterproof membranes, inflatable materials, and car covers. Further, the company engages in the park development, house leasing, and property management activities. The company was founded in 1986 and is based in Shanghai, China.

600651.SS.summary: Shanghai Feilo Acoustics Co., Ltd engages in research, development, and production of lighting products in China and internationally. It offers landscape lighting, road lighting, automotive lighting, indoor lighting, and other commercial lighting products, as well as electrical appliances, lamps and lanterns, and parts and components under the Ya and Sylvania brands. The company is also involved in the research and development, production, sale, and installation of LED products. Shanghai Feilo Acoustics Co., Ltd was founded in 1984 and is based in Shanghai, China.

600653.SS.summary: Liaoning Shenhua Holdings CO.,LTD. engages in the automobile sales and after-market services, new energy, real estate, financial investment, and industrial management businesses in China. The company sells China motors, and BMW and other brand cars, as well as VIP cars; manages office buildings and factory buildings; and offers building investment and real estate project services. It also operates wind and photovoltaic power projects. In addition, the company is involved in the automotive expo park business; provision of online travel management services through ltstar.com, lthotel.cn, and ltfly.com.cn platforms; supply of automotive products, electronic products, auto parts, and aftermarket products; financial leasing business; and research and development, modification, and sale of medical emergency products for imported and domestic medical vehicles, including ambulances and medical examination vehicles. Further, it provides higher vocational education, and middle and senior vocational skills education services. The company was formerly known as Shanghai Shenhua Holdings Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Liaoning Shenhua Holdings CO.,LTD. in December 2020. Liaoning Shenhua Holdings CO.,LTD. was founded in 1986 and is based in Shanghai, China.

600655.SS.long_name: Shanghai Yuyuan Tourist Mart (Group) Co., Ltd.
600655.SS.summary: Shanghai Yuyuan Tourist Mart (Group) Co., Ltd. operates as a tourism and financial company in China. The company engages in designing, producing, processing, wholesaling, and retailing of gold, silver, platinum, and diamond jewelry products, as well as jadeware, arts, and crafts; engages in catering and restaurants business; operates department stores; sells hardware and electricity products, chemical raw materials and products, metal materials, and construction and decoration materials; and engages in the wholesale and retail of furniture. It also provides catering business management, corporate management, investment and asset management, social and economic consulting, large-scale event organization, and exhibition services; engages in real estate development and operation, own house leasing, property management, e-commerce activities, and import and export of various types of goods and technologies; re-export trade and offset trade activities; and consignment business. The company was founded in 1896 and is based in Shanghai, China. Shanghai Yuyuan Tourist Mart (Group) Co., Ltd. operates as a subsidiary of Fosun International Limited.

600660.SS.long_name: Fuyao Glass Industry Group Co., Ltd.
600660.SS.summary: Fuyao Glass Industry Group Co., Ltd., together with its subsidiaries, provides solutions of safety glass for various transportation vehicles in China and internationally. It designs, manufactures, sells, and services automotive grade float glass, automotive glass, locomotive glass, luggage racks, and vehicle window trims, as well as offers relevant services. The company provides thermal insulation, sound insulation, head-up display, dimmable, ultraviolet-proof, water proof, solar energy, semi-tempered laminated, acoustic, heating, hydrophobic, dimming, antenna, heat insulation, lightweight, ambient, light transmittance, coated, and ultraviolet-cut glasses. It also offers photovoltaic and panoramic sunroofs; exterior decoration products; flush styling windows; and encapsulated glass and sliding window assemblies, as well as enveloping edge modularization products. The company was formerly known as Fujian Yaohua Glass Industry Group Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Fuyao Glass Industry Group Co., Ltd. in June 1992. Fuyao Glass Industry Group Co., Ltd. was founded in 1987 and is headquartered in Fuqing, China.

600676.SS.short_name: SHANGHAI JIAO YUN GROUP CO LTD
600676.SS.long_name: Shanghai Jiao Yun Group Co., Ltd.
600676.SS.summary: Shanghai Jiao Yun Group Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells automobile parts in China. It also offers road freight and logistics, road passenger transport, tourism, and automotive sales and after-sales services. The company was founded in 1993 and is based in Shanghai, China.

600682.SS.long_name: Nanjing Xinjiekou Department Store Co., Ltd.
600682.SS.summary: Nanjing Xinjiekou Department Store Co., Ltd. operates department stores in China. It also builds integrated hotels, and entertainment and shopping malls; and develops real estate properties. The company was founded in 1952 and is headquartered in Nanjing, China.

600689.SS.summary: Shanghai Sanmao Enterprise (Group) Co., Ltd. imports business apparel, wool fabrics, auto parts, and other products in China and internationally. The company invests in, leases, develops, and manages real estate properties; and provides network information technology related products and services, etc. It also offers security equipment, such as user monitoring and anti- theft reported to the police, as well as access control installation and maintenance, repair, and other services. The company was formerly known as Shanghai Sanmao Textile Co., Ltd. Shanghai Sanmao Enterprise (Group) Co., Ltd. was founded in 1993 and is based in Shanghai, China.

600694.SS.summary: Dashang Co., Ltd. operates a chain of department stores, supermarkets, and electrical appliance stores in China. It is also involved in the commercial real estate business; production of wine; and hotel, film studio, and beef businesses. The company was founded in 1995 and is headquartered in Dalian, China.

600699.SS.summary: Ningbo Joyson Electronic Corp. researches, develops, and manufactures automotive components in China, and internationally. It offers automotive safety products; driver control systems, air conditioning control systems, electronic control units, and sensor systems; new energy vehicle power control units; and smart car link products. The company was founded in 2004 and is headquartered in Ningbo, China.

600706.SS.long_name: Xi'an Qujiang Cultural Tourism Co., Ltd.
600706.SS.summary: Xi'an Qujiang Cultural Tourism Co., Ltd. engages in the tourism business in China. The company is involved in the operation and management of scenic spots; and hotel catering management and tourism brand marketing activities. The company was founded in 1984 and is based in Xi'an, China. Xi'an Qujiang Cultural Tourism Co., Ltd. is a subsidiary of Xi'an Qujiang Tourism Investment (Group) Co., Ltd.

600712.SS.summary: Nanning Department Store Co., Ltd. operates department stores and supermarkets in the People's Republic of China. It is also involved in e-commerce, car sales, commercial real estate, and other businesses. The company was founded in 1956 and is based in Nanning, China.

600715.SS.summary: Cultural Investment Holdings Co., Ltd. engages in film and online game operations. The company is involved in the cinema film screenings and related derivatives business; investments in film and television production and distribution; the provision of entertainment brokerage and related services; and development and operation of online games. It also engages in the development, production, and sale of automobile bodies, and provision of other automobile production support services. The company was formerly known as Song Liao Automotive Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Cultural Investment Holdings Co., Ltd. in April 2016. Cultural Investment Holdings Co., Ltd. was founded in 1993 and is based in Shenyang, China.

600721.SS.summary: Xinjiang Baihuacun Co., Ltd., together with its subsidiaries, engages in the coal selecting and mining, and coal chemical businesses in China and internationally. It provides coal, coke, and other coal chemical products, including metallurgical coke, gas coal coke, coal tar, crude benzene, composite ammonia, urea, and other products. The company was founded in 1959 and is based in Urumqi, China.

600729.SS.summary: Chongqing Department Store Co.,Ltd. operates department stores in the People's Republic of China. It operates 310 outlets in Chongqing, Sichuan, Guizhou, Hubei, and other places. The company was founded in 1950 and is based in Chongqing, the People's Republic of China.

600733.SS.long_name: BAIC BluePark New Energy Technology Co., Ltd.
600733.SS.summary: BAIC BluePark New Energy Technology Co.,Ltd. provides smart travel solutions in China and internationally. The company offers intelligent networked electric vehicles, charging and replacing services, and time-sharing leasing services, as well as vehicle maintenance and repair, and life-cycle butler services. BAIC BluePark New Energy Technology Co.,Ltd. was founded in 2009 and is based in Beijing, China.

600738.SS.long_name: Lanzhou Lishang Guochao Industrial Group Co.,Ltd
600738.SS.summary: Lanzhou Lishang Guochao Industrial Group Co.,Ltd operates department stores in China. It offers various products, such as food, cosmetics, gold jewelry, clothing, shoes and hats, luggage leather goods, cultural and sports goods, household appliances, etc. The company also operates hotels and restaurants. In addition, it constructs shopping malls, hotels, and offices. The company was formerly known as Lanzhou Minbaishareholding(Group) Co.,Ltd. Lanzhou Minbai Shareholding (Group) Co., Ltd. was founded in 1992 and is based in Lanzhou, China.

600741.SS.summary: HUAYU Automotive Systems Company Limited researches and develops, manufactures, and sells automotive parts worldwide. The company offers intelligent driving and vision products, and smart cabins; electric drive systems, thermal and battery management systems, and pump products; and automotive fuel systems. It also provides chassis systems comprising suspension, steering, braking, and transmission systems; and interior and exterior parts, seats, and passive safety systems. HUAYU Automotive Systems Company Limited was formerly known as Shanghai Bus Industry (Group) Co., Ltd. and changed its name as HUAYU Automotive Systems Company Limited on April 20, 2009. The company was founded in 1992 and is based in Shanghai, China.

600742.SS.summary: Changchun FAWAY Automobile Components Co.,Ltd designs, develops, manufactures, and sells auto parts in China. It offers car seats, instrument panels, door panels, seat frames, bumpers, grilles, mirrors, automotive filters, automotive lighting and stamping products, wheel assemblies, automotive electronics, and other automotive components. The company was formerly known as Changchun FAW Sihuan Automobile Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Changchun FAWAY Automobile Components Co.,Ltd in December 2008. Changchun FAWAY Automobile Components Co.,Ltd was founded in 1993 and is based in Changchun, China.

600749.SS.summary: Tibet Tourism Co.,Ltd provides tourism services in China. The company operates scenic spots, including the Yarlung Zangbo Grand Canyon in Linzhi City, Tibet Autonomous Region, the Shenshen Lake Ba Songcuo, the Benzri Mountain, the Lulang Huahai Ranch, and the Ali Area of the Tibet Autonomous Region. It also operates hotels, such as Himalaya Lhasa, Himalaya Grand Canyon, Himalaya Bazoncuo, Himalayan Pran, Himalaya Gang Rinpoche, Tarchin Xixia Bangma Xiangke, and Payang Town Xixiabangma, as well as Lulang Huahai Forest Villa Resort, and Ba Songcuo self-driving and outdoor camp. In addition, the company provides travel agency, tourist passenger transportation, and other tourism services. Tibet Tourism Co.,Ltd was founded in 1996 and is based in Lhasa, China.

600774.SS.summary: Wuhan Hanshang Group Co.,Ltd. engages in retail business in China. It is also involved in exhibition, real estate, and tourism businesses. The company is based in Wuhan, China.

600778.SS.summary: Xinjiang Youhao(Group)Co.,Ltd operates as a commercial retail enterprise in China. It operates shopping centers, department stores, supermarkets, electric appliance stores, and gourmet dining chain. The company was founded in 1958 and is based in Urumqi, China.

600785.SS.summary: Yinchuan Xinhua Commercial (Group) Co., Ltd. engages in commercial retail business in China. It operates department stores, supermarket chains, electronic chains, hypermarkets, convenience stores, etc., which offer stationery, sporting goods, office supplies, cosmetics, washing products, clothing, shoes, textiles, hardware, computer materials, household appliances, alcohol, tobacco, non-staple food, furniture, jewelry, watches, and arts and crafts. The company operates 242 stores under the Qinghai Xin Bai, Gansu Xin Bai, Xin Bai Bai Huo, Xin Bai Lian Chao, Xin Bai Electric Appliances, and Xin Bai Logistics brands located in the central business district of Ningxia and other provinces. It also engages in leasing business. The company was formerly known as Yinchuan Xinhua Department Store Co., Ltd. The company is based in Yinchuan, China. Yinchuan Xinhua Commercial (Group) Co., Ltd. is a subsidiary of Wu Mei Holdings Group Co., Ltd.

600814.SS.summary: Hangzhou Jiebai Group Co., Limited operates a chain of department stores in China. The company was founded in 1918 and is based in Hangzhou, China. Hangzhou Jiebai Group Co., Limited operates as a subsidiary of Hangzhou Commerce & Tourism Group Co., Ltd.

600818.SS.summary: Zhonglu.Co.,Ltd manufactures and sells bicycles in the People's Republic of China. It offers bicycles and electric bicycles under the Forever brand; wheelchairs; and bowling equipment; natural latex products; plastic paving materials; and automatic chess and card equipment, as well as public bicycle rental service systems. The company also exports its products to Europe, Asia, and Africa. Zhonglu.Co.,Ltd was founded in 1940 and is based in Shanghai, China.

600821.SS.summary: Tianjin Quanyechang (Group) Co., Ltd. operates department stores and supermarkets in Tianjin, China. Its stores offer dresses, jackets, sweaters, tops, trousers, sweater suits for women and children. Tianjin Quanyechang (Group) Co., Ltd. is based in Tianjin, China.

600824.SS.long_name: Shanghai Yimin Commercial Group Co., Ltd.
600824.SS.summary: Shanghai Yimin Commercial Group Co., Ltd. operates department stores in China. The company also operates commercial properties; and offers quasi financial and equity investment services. Its brands include Gujin Underwear, Tianbao Longfeng, Oriental Pawn, and Xingguang Photographic. The company was formerly known as Shanghai Yimin Commercial Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Shanghai Yimin Commercial Group Co., Ltd. in November 2010. Shanghai Yimin Commercial Group Co., Ltd. is based in Shanghai, China.

600827.SS.summary: Shanghai Bailian (Group) Co., Ltd. owns and operates department stores, shopping malls, outlets, large stores, supermarkets, and convenience stores. It is also involved in the fields of e-commerce, logistics, consumer services, commercial investment, real estate, asset management, and electronic information, as well as trades in non-ferrous and ferrous metals, automotive, light chemical, electrical, timber, fuel, etc. The company was founded in 2003 and is headquartered in Shanghai, China. Shanghai Bailian (Group) Co., Ltd. is a subsidiary of Bailian (Group) Co., Ltd.

600828.SS.summary: Maoye Commercial Co., Ltd. operates and manages department stores in the People's Republic of China. The company also engages in property management, as well operates hotels. It operates department stores under the names Maoye Tiandi, Maoye Department Store, Renhe Spring, People's Department Store, and Vidtory. As of December 31, 2019, the company operates 22 physical retail stores. The company was founded in 1953 and is based in Chengdu, the People's Republic of China.

600854.SS.long_name: Jiangsu chunlan refrigerating equipment stock co.,ltd.
600854.SS.summary: Jiangsu chunlan refrigerating equipment stock co.,ltd. manufactures and sells residential and commercial air conditioners in China and internationally. Its residential air conditioner products include floor standing, window, and wall split products; and commercial air conditioner products, such as dehumidifier, cassette, floor-standing, duct, enclosure, and outdoor unit products, as well as air cooler water, water cooled screw, and centrifugal chillers. The company also provides lithium and nickel metal hydride batteries, and battery management systems used in new energy vehicles, maglev trains, electric energy storage power stations, residential and container energy storage, automatic guided vehicles, industrial robots, communication base station back-up power supplies, and solar energy and wind energy storage systems. In addition, it offers bagged and bagless canister, stick, and wet and dry vacuum cleaners; energy storage mobile AC products; and air purifiers. Further, the company is involved in the financial and investment businesses, such as finance, securities, exchange, fund, insurance, equity, high-tech venture fund, etc.; and the manufacture and supply of machinery products for use in home appliance, machinery, molding and railway transportation, etc. Additionally, it develops and operates real estate properties, as well as offers related services; and operates Taizhou Chunlan Hotel and Chunlan Guest Hotel. The company is based in Taizhou, China.

600857.SS.summary: Ningbo Zhongbai Co., Ltd. primarily operates department stores. It also operates dry seafood market; and provides real estate development, property leasing, property management, and related ancillary services. The company was formerly known as Hit. Shouchuang Technology Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Ningbo Zhongbai Co., Ltd. in May 2015. Ningbo Zhongbai Co., Ltd. was founded in 1992 and is based in Ningbo, China.

600858.SS.summary: Inzone Group Co., Ltd. operates as a retail group in China. The company offers green food, jewelry, wine, electronics, and other products through department stores, supermarkets, shopping malls, outlets, e-commerce, and other retail formats. It operates through a network of 159 retail stores in Shandong, Hebei, Henan, Jiangsu, and other places. The company is based in Jinan, China.

600859.SS.summary: Wangfujing Group Co., Ltd. engages in retailing business in China. The company promotes the chain and scale development of department stores. It operates approximately 30 stores in 22 cities. Wangfujing Group Co., Ltd. was founded in 1955 and is based in Beijing, China.

600865.SS.summary: Baida Group Co.,Ltd primarily operates department stores in China. It also operates Hangzhou Hotel; and provides commercial property management services. The company was founded in 1989 and is based in Hangzhou, China.

600877.SS.summary: CETC Energy Joint-Stock Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells motorcycles and its engines primarily in the People's Republic of China. It offers street bikes, cub motorcycles, off-road motorcycles, scooters, cargo and passenger tricycles, special motorcycles, chopper motorcycles, and ATV quads. It also provides motorcycle engines; plastic and aspherical optical lens; general machinery components; and generators. The company sells its products primarily under the JiaLing and Traxx brands; and exports its products to approximately 90 countries and regions. The company was formerly known as China Jialing Industrial Co., Ltd. (Group) and changed its name to CETC Energy Joint-Stock Co., Ltd. in August 2019. The company was founded in 1875 and is based in Chongqing, the People's Republic of China. CETC Energy Joint-Stock Co., Ltd. is a subsidiary of China South Industry Corporation.
